<file path="/dialog.xml"><dialogs>
	<character id="player">
		<statement id="locked">It's locked!</statement>
		<statement id="adventure">They're on their way to adventure!</statement>
		<statement id="tie" link="please" linkEntityId="npcRumpleQuest">Amelia! Get a rope or something to tie him up!</statement>
	</character>

	<character id="amelia">
		<statement triggeredByEvent="talk_amelia" link="lets">Welcome to Poptropica!</statement>
		<statement id="lets" link="outfitted">Let's get you...</statement>
		<statement id="outfitted" link="everyone">An Outfit!</statement>
		<statement id="everyone" link="greatest">Everyone is headed out on their own adventures!</statement>
		<statement id="greatest">Just like the greatest adventurers of our time!</statement>
		<statement triggeredByEvent="took_off" link="chase">They took off with Xavier's statue!</statement>
		<statement id="chase">Go after them!</statement>
	</character>
	
	<character id="amelia2">
		<statement>Go find that robot!</statement>
		<!--
		<statement event="talked_to_amelia_store">Go out on your own adventure! Help the people of Poptropica!</statement>
		<statement event="has_home" link="store">I've made some exciting renovations to my store, want to check it out?</statement>
		<conversation id="store">
			<exchange>
				<question triggerEventArgs="talked_to_amelia_store,true" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Sure</question>
				<answer triggerEventArgs="runToStore" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Let's go!</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>Another time</question>
				<answer triggerEventArgs="talked_to_amelia_store,true" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Okay. Check it out soon!</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
		-->
		<statement event="has_home" link="tea">You know, I don’t think I've introduced myself properly.</statement>
		<statement id="tea" link="quest">My name's Amelia. Wanna come over for some tea?</statement>
		<conversation id="quest">
			<exchange>
				<question>Sure, I'd love to.</question>
				<answer triggerEventArgs="runToStore,true" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Great! I just live on the second floor of my store. Come on over.</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>Nice to meet you, but I'm busy right now.</question>
				<answer>I understand, but let me know if you ever have time!</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
		<statement event="runToStore">Meet me inside on the second floor of my store, I have a job for you.</statement>
	</character>
	
	<character id="npcDriver">
		<statement link="help_carrot">Did you know you can play islands for credits!</statement>
		<statement id="help_carrot" link="response_carrot">Do you want to play 24 Carrot Island right now?</statement>
		<conversation id="response_carrot">
			<exchange>
				<question triggerEventArgs="load_island_carrot_mainStreet" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Sure!</question>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>I've got enough credits, kid.</question>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
	</character>

	<character id="baronNPC">
		<statement link="aboard">Let's get off this dusty rock!</statement>
		<statement id="aboard">Climb aboard!</statement>
	</character>

	<character id="winterDriver">
		<statement triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="help" link="help">Happy Grapple-Pap to you! Could you deliver this gift to my dear sister?</statement>
		<conversation id="help">
			<exchange>
				<question triggerEvent="showItem" triggerEventArgs="claretasToy,hub">Certainly!</question>
				<answer triggerEventArgs="game.scenes.hub.winterEventTown.WinterEventTown" triggerEvent="loadScene">Hooray! She lives on an island far from here...</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>What is Grapple-Pap?</question>
				<answer>It's the time of year when all Poptropicans spread cheer!</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>Why can't you deliver it yourself?</question>
				<answer>These old legs just can't make such a journey and I have so many gifts to deliver!</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
		<statement event="hasItem_claretasToy" link="help2">You have not delivered the toy yet, do you need directions to bring it to her?</statement>
		<conversation id="help2">
			<exchange>
				<question>Yes please!</question>
				<answer triggerEventArgs="game.scenes.hub.winterEventTown.WinterEventTown" triggerEvent="loadScene">No problem! She lives on an island far from here...</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>No I'm just busy at the moment.</question>
				<answer>I see, well I hope you can bring it to her soon.</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
	</character>
</dialogs></file>

</hits></file><file path="/dialog.xml"><dialogs>
	<character id="amelia_store">
		<statement link="questions_arcade">Welcome to the store! How can I help you?</statement>
		<statement id="myth2" link="myth3">Get a cute little pet to follow you around and customize it in the Pets Section!</statement>
		<statement id="myth3">And you'll find all sorts of cool stuff on the store floor, from house decorations to powers!</statement>
		<conversation id="questions_arcade">
			<exchange>
				<question>What can I find here?</question>
				<answer link="myth2">You'll find everything you need to customize your look in the Gear section.</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>How do I earn more credits?</question>
				<answer>Log back in each day for a reward! Complete quests and islands and keep an eye out for special events on your map!</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>When will you get new stuff?</question>
				<answer>I update the items here often, so check back each week for new things! I'll keep some of the coolest items out on the floor longer.</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
		<statement event="runToStore">The door up to my room is on the far right. I'll be right up in a moment.</statement>
		<statement event="got_cargo" link="up">Great you found it!</statement>
		<statement id="up">Bring it up to my room, I'll be right up in a moment.</statement>
		</character>
</dialogs></file>

</hits></file><file path="/dialog.xml"><dialogs>
	<character id="player">
		<statement id="must" link="ido" linkEntityId="amelia">You must really like unicorns, huh?</statement>
		<statement id="boxInteraction">Wonder where all these shipments are headed.</statement>
		<statement id="dishInteraction">Amelia's kind of a slob...</statement>
		<statement id="wormInteraction">The heck is that thing?</statement>
		<statement id="bedInteraction">This is all very...extra.</statement>
	</character>
	<character id="amelia">
		<statement link="business">Welcome to my clubhouse! I have a job for you, a very secret job.</statement>
		<statement id="business"  triggerEventArgs="tea" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" link="tea">But before we talk business, would you like some tea?</statement>
		<conversation event="tea">
			<exchange>
				<question triggerEventArgs="setPart-item-tea" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Sure, I'd like some tea.</question>
				<answer>Here you are, it's tea all the way from Pelican Rock. I have to smuggle it out, ha!</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>So this is where you live?</question>
				<answer>Yep, right above my shop. It's small but it suits me.</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>What's the job?</question>
				<answer link="request">I've lost a shipment of extremely important cargo.</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
		<statement id="request" link="response">Will you retrieve it for me? It's a secret, so bring it back to my clubhouse here.</statement>
		<conversation id="response">
			<exchange>
				<question triggerEventArgs="start_amelias_quest,true" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" link="show" linkEntityId="amelia">Sure, I'll find it for you.</question>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>I don't have time right now.</question>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
		<statement triggeredByEvent="cancel_quest" triggerEventArgs="request" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Unfortunately, I will need certain guarantees you won't just bail on me after I tell you my secret.</statement>
		<statement id="show" triggerEvent="giveItem" triggerEventArgs="ameliaCargo" link="start_amelias_quest">Great! It should look a little something like this.</statement>
		<conversation event="start_amelias_quest">
			<exchange>
				<question>Where will I find the missing cargo?</question>
				<answer link="pirates" triggerEventArgs="ameliaCargo" triggerEvent="giveItem">The delivery was lost over Survival Island.</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>What's in the cargo?</question>
				<answer>It's secret, that's all I can say.</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>About my reward.</question>
				<answer>I'll give you a bunch of credits and an item for your trouble!</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
		<statement id="pirates">I have a problem with sky pirates. Well, really one sky pirate...</statement>
		<conversation event="got_cargo">
			<exchange>
				<question triggerEventArgs="ameliaCargo, amelia" triggerEvent="takeItem">I found your... very magical cargo...</question>
				<answer link="must" linkEntityId="player" triggerEventArgs="setAnim-amelia-Embarrassed" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Oh... oh you saw it? How embarrassing!</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
		<statement id="ido" triggerFirst="true" triggerEventArgs="setAnim-amelia-Enamored" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" link="dumb">Oh I do, I do love unicorns.</statement>
		<statement id="dumb" triggerFirst="true" triggerEventArgs="open_door" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" link="here">I know it's dumb but I love them!</statement>
		<statement id="here" triggerEventArgs="complete_amelias_quest, true" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Here, for your trouble!</statement>
		<statement id="delivered">I had your decoration delivered to your clubhouse, check it out there. It's so cute!</statement>
		<conversation event="complete_amelias_quest">
			<exchange>
				<question>Unicorns are pretty cute.</question>
				<answer link="dont">Aren't they?! With their little hooves and ears and pokey horns!</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>Unicorns are pretty dorky.</question>
				<answer link="dont">But I can't help myself!</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
		<statement id="dont">Don't tell anyone, please!</statement>
		<statement id="teaInteraction">I collect tea from all across Poptropica. Right now my favorite is Dragon leaf from Fairy Tale Island.</statement>
		<conversation id="deedInteraction">
			<exchange>
				<question>You own Home island?</question>
				<answer link="setupShop">Yeah, I bought it way back with all the credits I got from adventuring.</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
		<statement id="setupShop">Always wanted to set up shop and outfit the people of Poptropica.</statement>
		<statement id="trophyInteraction">Won the Great Race that year.</statement>
		<statement id="roomInteraction">Yeah, my room's a bit of… a mess.</statement>
		<statement id="post_quest" triggerEventArgs="post_responses" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" link="post_responses">Welcome back, would you like some tea?</statement>
		<conversation event="post_responses">
			<exchange>
				<question triggerEventArgs="setPart-item-tea" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Sure, I'd like some tea.</question>
				<answer>Here you are. This tea comes from trees found right here on the island!</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>Seen any unicorns lately?</question>
				<answer>Ha, ha, very funny. But yes! There are whole herds of them on Fairy Tale!</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>Anything new going on?</question>
				<answer>I may have some more quests for you in the future. I'll come find you when I do.</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
	</character>
</dialogs></file>

<file path="/dialog.xml">
	<dialogs>
		<character id="player">
			<statement link="here" linkEntityId="baron" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="setAnim-player-Greif">How are we going to solve a puzzle like this!</statement>
			<statement id="confused"triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="setAnim-player-Genie|setAnim-baron-Sit" link="how" linkEntityId="baron">We're going to solve it with a wrench?</statement>
			<statement id="what" link="duck" linkEntityId="baron" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="start_bash, true">What if it shoots poison darts?</statement>
		</character>
		<character id="baron">
			<statement id="callout1">Old Cap'n Crawfish stowed something away in here somewhere.</statement>
			<statement id="callout2">We should watch out for pirate traps.</statement>
			<statement id="callout3">This treasure is going to be big, I can feel it!</statement>
			<statement id="callout4">I've been waiting a long time for this.</statement>
			<statement id="callout5" link="b5">Ol' Crawfish was into some spooky stuff...</statement>
			<statement id="b5">We should keep an eye out...</statement>
			<statement id="here" link="confused" linkEntityId="player" triggerFirst="true" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="setPart-item-wrench|setAnim-baron-Salute">Here Take this.</statement>
			<statement id="how" link="guards">There's no we, you're on whacking duty.</statement>
			<statement id="guards" link="holes">Ruins like this tend to have... guards, let's call them.</statement>
			<statement id="holes" link="whack" triggerFirst="true" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="setAnim-baron-PointPistol">Stand by these conspicuous holes here while I solve this.</statement>
			<statement id="whack" link="what" linkEntityId="player" triggerFirst="true" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="setAnim-baron-Attack| setAnim-player-Tremble">Whack anything you see coming out of them. Got it?</statement>
			<statement id="duck" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="setAnim-baron-Focus| game.scenes.hub.baronBash.BaronBash">...Duck?</statement>
			<statement event="start_bash" link="continue">They sure are relentless, can you keep going?</statement>
			<conversation id="continue">
				<exchange>
					<question>I won't let you down.</question>
					<answer triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="setAnim-baron-Proud| game.scenes.hub.baronBash.BaronBash">That's the spirit!</answer>
				</exchange>
				<exchange>
					<question>I need a break.</question>
					<answer triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="setAnim-baron-BigStomp| game.scenes.hub.baronHouse.BaronHouse">Fine. Rest up and we can try again later.</answer>
				</exchange>
			</conversation>
			<statement event="bash_complete" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="setAnim-baron-Proud| setLabel-anim_puzzle-puzzle_open">Got it!</statement>
			<statement id="more" link="trouble" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="complete_barons_quest,true">Ha, we should do this more often.</statement>
			<statement id="trouble" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="setAnim-baron-Salute| game.scenes.hub.baronHouse.BaronHouse">Here, for your troubles.</statement>
		</character>
	</dialogs>
</file>

		<conversation event="second">
				<exchange>
				<question>What can I find here?</question>
				<answer>Each month I return with a new batch of discoveries.</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>Where do you find your items?</question>
				<answer>All across Poptropica. My airship takes me to every island, even those lost in time.</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>What's with the monkey?</question>
				<answer link="monkey">Haha! We shouldn't speak of Amelia that way, her outfitter shop is very... quaint.</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
		<statement event="barons_quest_init" forceOnScreen="true">Use that hatch to Head down below, I'll meet you there.</statement>

<file path="/dialog.xml"><dialogs>
	<character id="npc1">
		<statement>Watch your valuables! There are thieves about.</statement>
    </character>
    
	<character id="npc2">
		<statement>The sultan holes himself up in the palace with his riches, while the people are terrorized by the 40 thieves!</statement>
    </character>
    
    <character id="npc3">
		<statement>I've tried to sneak into the palace, but the guards are too quick.</statement>
    </character>
    
    <character id="npc4">
		<statement>The view from the top is amazing! You can see the whole desert.</statement>
    </character>

	<character id="trader1">
		<statement id="comment">I can tell you have a good eye! This is, indeed, a magical lamp.</statement>
		<statement triggerEventArgs="trader1" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" lockInput="true">Let's trade!</statement>
    </character>
    
	<character id="trader2">
		<statement id="comment">My spyglass will let you see things you could never have imagined.</statement>
		<statement triggerEventArgs="trader2" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" lockInput="true">Let's trade!</statement>
    </character>
    
    <character id="trader3">
    	<statement id="comment">Isn't this the most beautiful camel you've ever seen? Shame about the biting...</statement>
		<statement triggerEventArgs="trader3" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" lockInput="true">Let's trade!</statement>
		<statement id="gave_camel_harness">If you can control him, this camel will follow you just about anywhere.</statement>
    </character>
    
    <character id="player">
		<statement id="smoke_bomb_left">Looks like they left something behind.</statement>
		<statement id="camel_taken">So that's where their hideout is!</statement>
		<statement id="need_spy_glass">Looks like it's meant to hold a spyglass.</statement>
    </character>
</dialogs></file>

<file path="/dialog.xml"><dialogs>
	<character id="sultan">
		<conversation id="quest">
			<exchange>
				<question>What happened here?</question>
				<answer>The forty thieves happened! They ransacked my palace and left me with nothing.</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>You mean, you're broke?</question>
				<answer>Money can be replaced, But the thieves took one precious thing from me: a lamp that is like no other. Find it, and I will grant you a fabulous reward.</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>How can I find the lamp?</question>
				<answer triggerEventArgs="questAccepted, true" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">I don't know. But perhaps you can start your quest with this. It is my last jewel. Trade it wisely.</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
		<statement id="findMyLamp">Find my lamp, and I will grant you a fabulous reward.</statement>
		<statement id="lamp">That is nothing but an ordinary lamp. The lamp I seek is like no other.</statement>
    </character>
</dialogs></file>

<item id="thieves_garb">
	<type>island</type>
	<subType>arab2</subType>
	<textfields>
		<text id="title">
			<value>Thieves Garb</value>
		</text>
	</textfields>

	<assets>
		<asset id="cardBack">
  			<assetPath>items/arab2/background.zip</assetPath>
       		<effect>
      			<name>adjustColorFilter</name>
      			<enabled>true</enabled>
      			<brightness>0</brightness>
     			<contrast>0</contrast>
     			<saturation>-79</saturation>
     			<hue>8</hue>
    		</effect>
    	</asset>
    	<asset id="cardContent"/>
	</assets>

    <buttons>
		<btn>
			<conditional id="hasLook" isTrue="false"></conditional>
    		<label>PUT ON</label>
    		<actions>
	    		<action type="applyLook"/>
	    		<action type="triggerEvent">
		  			<parameters>
		  				<param id="event">player_disguised</param>
		  				<param id="save">true</param>		  				
					</parameters>
				</action>
			</actions>
  		</btn>
		<btn>
			<conditional id="hasLook" isTrue="true"></conditional>
    		<label>REMOVE</label>
    		<actions>
	    		<action type="removeLook"/>   
	    		<action type="removeEvent">
		  			<parameters>
		  				<param id="event">player_disguised</param>
					</parameters>
				</action> 		
			</actions>
  		</btn>
	</buttons>
	
	<conditionals>
		<conditional type="hasLook"/>
	</conditionals>

	<looks>
		<look>
			<facial>an2_player</facial>
			<overshirt>an2_player</overshirt>
			<pants>an_thief2</pants>
		</look>
	</looks>
</item>

		<statement id="examineLamps">I need help to find the right lamp!</statement>
	</character>
	<character id="masterThief">
		<statement id="getLamp">It's easy: just pick one lamp and place it on the altar.</statement>
		<statement id="getLamp2">If it's the right one, you'll be set free!</statement>
		<statement id="getLamp4">Yes, the altar will destroy anyone who places the wrong lamp on it.</statement>
		<statement id="getLamp5">Then you'd better pick the right one!</statement>
		<statement id="getLamp8">Not again!</statement>
		<statement id="getLamp9">We'll run out of prisoners before we ever run out of lamps.</statement>
		<statement id="fallIn2">Take this interloper to a cell!</statement>
		<statement id="fallIn3">We'll deal with you later. Back to work, everyone.</statement>
		<statement id="gotLamp2">Not so fast. The magical lamp is mine. Show it to me!</statement>
		<statement id="getAwayM">Don't let him get away!</statement>
		<statement id="getAwayF">Don't let her get away!</statement>
	
		<statement id="useLamp">Well, well, well... isn't this a familiar scene.</statement>
		<statement id="useLamp3">Ha, if I had a gold piece for every time I heard that!</statement>
		<statement id="useLamp5">Silence!</statement>
		<statement id="useLamp6">Get on with it kid, or I'll have tiny here teach you how.</statement>
    </character>
	<character id="prisoner">
		<statement id="getLamp3">But the... the... curse!</statement>
		<statement id="getLamp6">Whew!</statement>
		<statement id="getLamp7">...wait, what's happening?</statement>
    </character>
    <character id="masterCoin">
    	<statement event="player_disguised">I'm quite busy here, don't you need to be somewhere?</statement>
    	<statement id="finalyCounted">yes, Finally recounted my precious coins!</statement>
    	<statement id="catchPlayer">Eek! Guards!</statement>
    	<statement id="catchPlayer2">Don't touch those lamps!</statement>
    	<statement id="chaseGold1">Oh no! The gold!</statement>
    	<statement id="chaseGold2">I've lost count! I've lost count!</statement>
    	<statement id="chaseGold3">Oh no! Not again!</statement>
    	<statement id="useLamp4">Uh...</statement>
    	<statement id="dontTouchCoins">Don't touch my coins, I'll lose count!</statement>
    </character>
    <character id="vizier">
    	<statement forceOnScreen="true" id="follow">Follow me, quietly.</statement>
    	<statement id="distract">We need to somehow distract him to get to the lamps.</statement>
    	<statement id="fineWork">Fine work! Let's get to the lamps.</statement>
    	<statement id="gotLamp">Let's get out of here before the thieves find us!</statement>
    	<statement id="gotLamp3">Of course, of course. No cause for alarm.</statement>
    	<statement id="gotLamp4">I will, indeed, show you the correct lamp.</statement>
    	<statement id="gotLamp6">Go! Now! </statement>
    	<statement forceOnScreen="true" id="stop">Stop, He'll see you!</statement>
    </character>

	<character id="player">

	</character>

    <character id="vizier2">
    	<statement forceOnScreen="true" id="intro">You said the sultan called it "a lamp like no other", give me the lamp that fits that description!</statement>
    	<statement forceOnScreen="true" id="success">That's it! We must bring it to the Sultan immediately!</statement>
    	<statement forceOnScreen="true" id="nope0">That can't be the right one.</statement>
    	<statement forceOnScreen="true" id="nope1">Nope, I think i have one of these back home.</statement>
    	<statement forceOnScreen="true" id="nope2">There's another one of these right over there, try again.</statement>
    	<statement forceOnScreen="true" id="nope3">Not this one, it has a price tag on it! A cheap one too!</statement>
    	<statement forceOnScreen="true" id="nope4">Shiny, but not "like no other" by the looks of it.</statement>
    </character>

<file path="/dialog.xml"><dialogs>
	<character id="char1">
		<conversation>
			<exchange>
				<question>Who are you?</question>
				<answer>I’m Tony, the owner of this diner.</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>How's business?</question>
				<answer>Momma Mia! It’s never been worse!</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>Who are those people on the bulletin?</question>
				<answer triggerEventArgs="show_poster" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Those people have all been missing for several months!</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
		<statement event="destroyed_rabbot">Grazie tanto! Thank you for bringing back business!</statement>
	</character>
	<character id="waitress">
		<conversation>
			<exchange>
				<question>Do you work here?</question>
				<answer>Of course. You think I hang out here for fun?</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>How's work?</question>
				<answer>Honey, I'm just happy to have a job!</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>What's that in your hand?</question>
				<answer triggerEventArgs="talked_with_waitress" triggerEvent="completeEvent">It's a pitcher of milk.</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
		<conversation event="destroyed_rabbot">
			<exchange>
				<question>Do you work here?</question>
				<answer>I sure do!</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>How's work?</question>
				<answer>Things are going\nmuch better now!</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>Thanks for the milk.</question>
				<answer>No problem, honey.</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
		<conversation event="gotItem_bowlOfMilk">
			<exchange>
				<question>Do you work here?</question>
				<answer>Of course. You think I hang out here for fun?</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>How's work?</question>
				<answer>Honey, I'm just happy to have a job!</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>Thanks for the milk.</question>
				<answer>No problem, honey.</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
		<conversation event="gotItem_emptyBowl">
			<exchange>
				<question>Do you work here?</question>
				<answer>Of course. You think I hang out here for fun?</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>How's work?</question>
				<answer>Honey, I'm just happy to have a job!</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>Can you fill this bowl with milk?</question>
				<answer triggerEventArgs="emptyBowl,bowlOfMilk" triggerEvent="exchangeItems">Sure!</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
	</character>
	<character id="char3">
		<statement>I wouldn't be here if it weren't for you!</statement>
	</character>
</dialogs></file>

				<question>What are you doing?</question>

	</character>

<file path="/dialog.xml"><dialogs>
	<character id="char1">
	    <conversation>
	        <exchange>
	            <question>What's wrong?</question>
	            <answer>Our beloved town is in ruins!</answer>
	        </exchange>
	        <exchange>
	            <question>What happened?</question>
	            <answer>All of our carrots have vanished! Our economy is falling apart!</answer>
	        </exchange>
	        <exchange>
	            <question>What can I do to help?</question>
	            <answer triggerEventArgs="talked_with_mayor|showProgress" triggerEvent="completeEvent">Find out what’s happened to our carrots!</answer>
	        </exchange>
	    </conversation>
		
		<statement id="destroyed_rabbot" link="get_medal">The carrots have stopped disappearing!</statement>
		<statement id="get_medal" triggerEventArgs="award_medal" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">You've saved our town! As mayor, I present you with this medallion!</statement>
		
		<statement event="gotItem_medalCarrot">Thank you! Now we can get started on making this town great again!</statement>
	</character>
	<character id="char2">
		<statement>They closed the Carrot Cake Factory and now I'm out of work.</statement>
		<statement event="destroyed_rabbot">There's lots of work to be done!</statement>
	</character>
	<character id="char3">
		<statement>Sorry, but we're all out of gas.</statement>
		<statement event="destroyed_rabbot" link="reopen">Things are looking up around here.</statement>
		<statement id="reopen">I should be able to reopen the station soon!</statement>
	</character>
	<character id="char5">
		<statement>It's good to be back home! Thanks!</statement>
	</character>
</dialogs></file>

<file path="/dialog.xml"><dialogs>
	<character id="drone2">
		<conversation>
			<exchange>
				<question>Who are you?</question>
				<answer>Can't talk. Must process carrots.</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>What are you doing?</question>
				<answer>Can't talk. Must process carrots.</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>Look out behind you!</question>
				<answer triggerEventArgs="drone_tricked_2" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Where?</answer> 
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
		
		<statement triggeredByEvent="drone_freed_2">Thank you! Now be careful. If you’re seen without rabbot ears Dr. Hare will catch you!</statement>
		<statement event="drone_normal_2">Thank you! Now be careful. If you’re seen without rabbot ears Dr. Hare will catch you!</statement>
	</character>
	
	<character id="drone3">

			<exchange>
				<question>Who are you?</question>
				<answer>Can't talk. Must process carrots.</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>What are you doing?</question>

			</exchange>

<file path="/dialog.xml"><dialogs>
	<character id="player">
		<statement id="present_cat">I found your cat!</statement>
	</character>
	<character id="owner">
		<conversation>
			<exchange>
				<question>Who are you?</question>
				<answer>I'm Charlie.</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>Feeling down?</question>
				<answer>I lost my cat, Whiskers. If you can find her, I’ll give you a crowbar for free!</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>Where did you last see your cat?</question>
				<answer>Well, she used to hang out by the old farm house.</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
		<conversation event="cat_returned">
			<exchange>
				<question>Whiskers looks happy to be home.</question>
				<answer>Yes, thank you so much for finding her!</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>Is there anything else you need?</question>
				<answer>I'm okay, but this town sure could use some help!</answer>
			</exchange>	
		</conversation>
		<conversation event="destroyed_rabbot">
			<exchange>
				<question>Whiskers looks happy to be home.</question>
				<answer>Yes, thank you so much for finding him!</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>Is there anything else you need?</question>
				<answer>Nope. You've helped me and the whole town already!</answer>
			</exchange>						
		</conversation>	
		<statement id="cat_following" triggerEventArgs="cat_returned" link="crowbar_give" triggerEvent="completeEvent">Whiskers!!! Come here, you little rascal!</statement>
		<statement id="crowbar_give" triggerEventArgs="crowbar" triggerEvent="giveItem">Thank you! I can't afford to give you much, but maybe you could use this crowbar.</statement>
	</character>
	<character id="char3">
		<statement>I'm enjoying my freedom. Thanks!</statement>
	</character>
</dialogs></file>

    <character id="guard2">
		<statement id="scram">Scram.</statement>
    </character>
    
    <character id="bouncer">
    	<statement id="getOff">Get down from there!</statement>
	
		<statement id="catapult" triggerEventArgs="inquire_further" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Yeah, it sure is cool. Wait, did you say dangerous? Yes. Dangerous.</statement>
		<statement forceOnScreen="true" linkEntityId="player" id="theNorse" link="nostalgia">Those people dressed as Norsemen out there. They lovingly crafted it. It looks like it would really work!</statement>
		<statement id="goPlay" triggerEventArgs="regain_control" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">I'd like to go to the con, but… nah. This is all silly stuff. Kids' stuff.</statement>
		
		<statement event="showMjolnir" linkEntityId="player" link="bribeHammer">Wow! That's an amazing Mjolnir replica!</statement>
		<statement id="theOneTrue" triggerEventArgs="regain_control" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Sorry, only Thor himself could move me from this spot. </statement>
		
		<statement linkEntityId="player" id="cantBe" link="datHammer">The Norse God Thor! Is it really you?</statement>
		<statement linkEntityId="player" id="repost" link="beGone">Looks like a replica I saw earlier, but never mind. How may I serve you, o powerful Thor?</statement>
		<statement id="toatsMcGoats" triggerEventArgs="bouncer_out, true" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Yes! Yes! It's all I ever wanted!</statement>
    </character>
    
    <character id="player">
    	<statement linkEntityId="guard1" id="guard1" link="vips">May I go in this way?</statement>
		<statement linkEntityId="guard2" id="guard2" link="scram">May I go in this way?</statement>
		<statement id="bouncer" triggerEventArgs="dat_catapult" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">That catapult looks pretty dangerous.</statement>
		
		<statement linkEntityId="bouncer" id="inquireFurther" link="theNorse">Where did it come from?</statement>
		<statement linkEntityId="bouncer" id="nostalgia" link="goPlay">You sound wistful.</statement>
		
		<statement linkEntityId="bouncer" id="bribeHammer" link="theOneTrue">Perhaps I could give this to you in exchange for letting me use the catapult.</statement>

		<statement id="iAmWhoAm" triggerEventArgs="thor_almighty" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">I have come bearing an important message.</statement>
		<statement id="datHammer" triggerEventArgs="flash_hammer" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Of course it's me. Just look at my hammer.</statement>
		<statement linkEntityId="bouncer" id="beGone" link="toatsMcGoats">You should totally leave your post and hang out at the con.</statement>
		
		<statement id="bucky" triggerEventArgs="viking2_quest_complete, true" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Bucky Lucas as the Norse god of thunder? Sounds like a hit!</statement>
		<statement id="forGlory">FOR GLORY!</statement>
    </character>
    
    <!-- <character id="hero">    <statement triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="panic">Without my super powers, I'm too scared to climb down!</statement>    </character> -->
</dialogs></file>

<file path="/dialog.xml"><dialogs>
	<character id="spFan">
		<statement id="no cutting">Hey! No cutting!</statement>
		<conversation>
			<exchange>
				<question>Any chance I can move ahead of you?</question>
				<answer triggerEventArgs="spFan_quest_accepted, true" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">If you can replace my busted jetpack, you can steam right past me.</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
		<statement event="spFan_quest_complete" id="spFan_quest_complete">To the sky!</statement>
    </character>
    
    <character id="sfFan">
    	<statement id="no cutting">Hey! No cutting!</statement>
		<conversation>
			<exchange>
				<question>Excuse me, could I possibly trade your place in line?</question>
				<answer triggerEventArgs="sfFan_quest_accepted, true" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">If you can trade me the Fremulon mask from the booth, i'll give up my spot.</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
		<statement event="sfFan_quest_complete" linkEntityId="player" id="sfFan_quest_complete" link="idk" triggerEventArgs="sfFan_passed, true" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">May your zazzleblax be abundant.</statement>
		<statement event="sfFan_passed" linkEntityId="player" id="sfFan_passed" link="idk">May your zazzleblax be abundant.</statement>
    </character>
    
    <character id="shFan">
   		<statement id="no cutting">Hey! No cutting!</statement>
		<conversation>
			<exchange>
				<question>I'm in a real hurry. Can I cut past you?</question>
				<answer linkEntityId="player" link="where">Only the one who wields the Power Amulet can displace me!</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
		<statement id="cheetah" triggerEventArgs="shFan_quest_accepted, true" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">The Cheetah Bandit has it, of course!</statement>
		<statement event="shFan_quest_complete" id="shFan_quest_complete" triggerEventArgs="shFan_passed, true" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">You are truly powerful! I cede my spot.</statement>
		<statement event="shFan_passed" id="shFan_passed">You are truly powerful! I cede my spot.</statement>
    </character>
    
    <character id="viking1">
		<statement triggerEventArgs="viking1_quest_accepted, true" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">If you can find out what time the cosplay contest is, i'll give you my spot.</statement>
		<conversation event="viking1_quest_complete">
			<exchange>
				<question>The contest starts at noon.</question>
				<answer triggerEventArgs="viking1_passed, true" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Thanks!</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
		<statement id="no cutting">Hey! No cutting!</statement>
    </character>
    
    <character id="viking2">
    	<statement triggerEventArgs="viking2_quest_accepted, true" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">I'm wracking my brain to remember who played Thor in that old Viking movie. Remind me, and I'll trade my spot.</statement>
		<conversation event="viking2_quest_complete">
			<exchange>
				<question>Bucky Lucas played Thor.</question>
				<answer triggerEventArgs="viking2_passed, true" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">That's it! I was thinking of Kirk Strayer, for some reason. Thanks.</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
		<statement id="no cutting">Hey! No cutting!</statement>
    </character>
    
    <character id="friend">
    	<statement>Hey pal, don't you know it's rude to cut in line?</statement>
		<conversation event="friend_quest_complete" id="friend_quest_complete">
			<exchange>
				<question>Hey there, are you holding something for your friend?</question>
				<answer link="in the bathroom">I had it when I went into the bathroom, but I must have left it there.</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
		<conversation id="in the bathroom">
			<exchange>
				<question>In the bathroom, you say.</question>
				<answer triggerEventArgs="friend_passed, true" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Now the line is so long! Forget it, I'm going home. Nice costume, by the way.</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
		<statement id="no cutting">Hey! Line for the bathroom is over here.</statement>
		
		<statement linkEntityId="player" id="cutter" link="ditto">How did you get in front of the line?</statement>
		<statement id="enjoy" triggerEventArgs="jerk_leaves_bathrooms, true" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Well, enjoy yourself in there. I kept it nice and warm for you.</statement>
    </character>
    
     <character id="player">
     	<statement linkEntityId="shFan" id="where" link="cheetah">Where is the power amulet?</statement>
    	<statement id="idk">I still have no idea what zazzleblax is.</statement>
    	<statement id="darn">Wish I'd thought of that.</statement>
    	<statement linkEntityId="friend" id="ditto" link="enjoy">I could ask you the same thing.</statement>
    	<statement id="never">I never want to go in there again!</statement>
    </character>
</dialogs></file>

<file path="/dialog.xml"><dialogs>
	<character id="costume">
		<statement id="ask_tutorial" link="tutorial">You'll be changing costumes a lot in Poptropicon. Do you want to learn how to costumize?</statement>
		<conversation id="tutorial">
			<exchange>
				<question triggerEventArgs="start_tutorial" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Yes.</question>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question triggerEventArgs="no_tutorial" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">No thanks.</question>
				<answer>Make sure you save your current look if you don't want to lose any of the parts.</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
		
		<statement>You can costumize yourself with any characters you see here at the convention!</statement>
		<statement id="tutorial_done">Make sure you save your current look if you don't want to lose any of the parts.</statement>
    </character>
    
    <character id="fantasy">
    	<conversation>
				<exchange>
					<question>Do you have an extra ticket?</question>
					<answer link="first_link">I'm holding one for a friend, but I have no idea where he is.</answer>
				</exchange>
				<exchange>
					<question>What does he look like?</question>
					<answer triggerEventArgs="friend_quest_accepted,true" link="friend_quest_accepted" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">He's dressed as a wizard. You can't miss him: pointed dark hat, robe with a moon amulet, white beard, wooden staff.</answer>
				</exchange>
			</conversation>
		
			<conversation id="first_link">
				<exchange>
					<question>What does he look like?</question>
					<answer triggerEventArgs="friend_quest_accepted,true" link="friend_quest_accepted" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">He's dressed as a wizard. You can't miss him: pointed dark hat, robe with a moon amulet, white beard, wooden staff.</answer>
				</exchange>
			</conversation>
		
			<statement event="deal_off">Deal's off!</statement>
		
			<conversation event="some_wizard_parts">
				<exchange>
					<question>Here I am! I'll take my ticket now.</question>
					<answer id="show_selfie">You're not my friend. He looks like this.</answer>
				</exchange>
			</conversation>
		
			<statement event="friend_quest_accepted">Here's a selfie we took earlier.</statement>
		
			<conversation event="take_ticket">
				<exchange>
					<question>Here I am! I'll take my ticket now.</question>
					<answer link="ticket_link">You're finally back from the bathroom. Okay, where is it?</answer>
				</exchange>
			</conversation>
		
			<conversation id="ticket_link">
				<exchange>
					<question>Where is what?</question>
					<answer linkEntityId="player" link="promise_reply">You know the deal. I give you a ticket and you give me what you promised.</answer>
				</exchange>
			</conversation>			
		
			<conversation event="gotItem_mjolnir">
				<exchange>
					<question>I found what you were looking for!</question>
					<answer link="outdoor_toilet">You surely deserve my extra ticket now! Where did you find it?</answer>
				</exchange>
			</conversation>		
		
			<conversation id="outdoor_toilet">
				<exchange>
					<question>In an outdoor toilet.</question>
					<answer linkEntityId="player" link="deal_off">Uh... deal's off.</answer>
				</exchange>
			</conversation>	
    </character>
    
    <character id="racer">
    	<statement event="racer_not_beat" link="race">The Power Amulet cannot be given. It can only be earned. Beat me to the top of the water tower and it shall be yours!</statement>
    	<statement event="racer_beat" link="race">Wow you are quick! Want to see if you can beat me again?</statement>
    	<conversation id="race">
    		<exchange>
    			<question triggerEventArgs="play_race" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">You're on!</question>
    		</exchange>
    		<exchange>
    			<question>Maybe later.</question>
    		</exchange>
    	</conversation>
    </character>
    
    <character id="player">
    	<statement id="promise_reply" triggerEventArgs="friend_quest_complete,true" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Of course, I'll, er, be right back.</statement>
    	<statement id="noon">Costume contest at noon, eh?</statement>
    	<statement id="deal_off" triggerEventArgs="deal_off" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Rats. I need to find another way inside.</statement>
    </character>
    
    <character id="line1">
    	<conversation>
			<exchange>
				<question>What are you waiting for?</question>
				<answer link="extra_ticket">The Mighty Action Force Trailer!</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>Do you have an extra ticket?</question>
				<answer>Nay. It's been sold out for months.</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
		
		<conversation id="extra_ticket">
			<exchange>
				<question>Do you have an extra ticket?</question>
				<answer>Nay. It's been sold out for months.</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
    </character>
    
    <character id="line2">
    	<conversation>
			<exchange>
				<question>Do you have an extra ticket?</question>
				<answer>Are you kidding?</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
    </character>
    
    <character id="line3">
    	<conversation>
			<exchange>
				<question>Do you have an extra ticket?</question>
				<answer>Scram, earthling!</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
    </character>
    
    <character id="line4">
    	<conversation>
			<exchange>
				<question>Do you have an extra ticket?</question>
				<answer>No way!</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
    </character>
    
    <character id="wizard_line">
    	<conversation>
			<exchange>
				<question>Do you have an extra ticket?</question>
				<answer>I'm no magician, I'm a wizard. I can't magically pull tickets out of my hat.</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
    </character>
    
    <character id="witch">
    	<statement>Don't tell anyone I'm up here!</statement>
    </character>
    
    <character id="wizard_soda">
    	<statement>Machine stole my money!</statement>
    </character>
    
    <character id="soda">
    	<statement>This soda is delicious!</statement>
    </character>
    
    <character id="eater">
    	<statement>Nom Nom Nom!</statement>
    </character>
</dialogs></file>

<file path="/dialog.xml"><dialogs>
	<character id="alien_teacher">
		<statement event="gotItem_fremulon_mask">Impressive! Your studying paid off.</statement>
		<statement event="gotItem_pamphlet">Study up!</statement>
		<conversation>
			<exchange>
				<question>Can I learn to speak Fremulon?</question>
				<answer link="link_question">Anyone can, as long as they've got the zazzleblax for it.</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>What's a zazzleblax?</question>
				<answer triggerEventArgs="pamphlet" triggerEvent="giveItem">You'd know if you spoke Fremulon! Study up.</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
		
		<conversation id="link_question">
			<exchange>
				<question>What's a zazzleblax?</question>
				<answer triggerEventArgs="pamphlet" triggerEvent="giveItem">You'd know if you spoke Fremulon! Study up.</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
    </character>
    
    <character id="alien_guy">
    	<statement>...</statement>
    	<statement event="sfFan_quest_accepted" link="first_question">You want this mask? Let's see if you can carry on a basic conversation in our language!</statement>
    	<statement id="first_question" link="part1">Scrash sumbellugh?</statement>
    	    	
    	<conversation id="part1">
    		<exchange>
    			<question>Scram, bleezebub!</question>
    			<answer>That's not right. You should study your Fremulon.</answer>
    		</exchange>
    		<exchange>
    			<question>Crumbs bellazugh!</question>
    			<answer>That's not right. You should study your Fremulon.</answer>
    		</exchange>
    		<exchange>
    			<question>Scrum bellazugh!</question>
    			<answer link="part2">Crozzy zup bemblex?</answer>
    		</exchange>    		
    	</conversation>
    	
    	<conversation id="part2">
    		<exchange>
    			<question>Bumple up framozan.</question>
    			<answer>That's not right. You should study your Fremulon.</answer>
    		</exchange> 
    		<exchange>
    			<question>Bemblex zup amfrozan.</question>
    			<answer link="part3">Groffzellux scrumble blurge?</answer>
    		</exchange>
    		<exchange>
    			<question>Blem blox are frozen.</question>
    			<answer>That's not right. You should study your Fremulon.</answer>
    		</exchange>    		  		
    	</conversation>
    	
    	<conversation id="part3">
    		<exchange>
    			<question>Blurge scrashble bellazagur.</question>
    			<answer triggerEventArgs="fremulon_mask" triggerEvent="giveItem">I am impressed! You are a true Fremulon. You have earned this.</answer>
    		</exchange>
    		<exchange>
    			<question>Barge scrabble alligator.</question>
    			<answer>That's not right. You should study your Fremulon.</answer>
    		</exchange>  
    		<exchange>
    			<question>Klaatu barada nikto.</question>
    			<answer>That's not right. You should study your Fremulon.</answer>
    		</exchange>    		  		
    	</conversation>    	
    	
    	<statement event="gotItem_fremulon_mask">You earned that mask!</statement>
    </character>
    
    <character id="wizard">
    	<statement>MMMMM, these pizza puffs are delicious!</statement>
    </character>
    
    <character id="pizza_girl">
    	<statement>Blah, Blah, Pepe's!</statement>
    </character>
    
    <character id="viking">
    	<statement>If you want to make your own costume parts, this is the place to do it!</statement>
    </character>
    
    <character id="player">
    	<statement id="noInstructions">I don't know what to make without any instructions.</statement>
    	<statement id="basicFail">That's not right. I should check the instructions.</statement>
    	<statement id="stickingFail">It's not sticking together!</statement>
    </character>
</dialogs></file>

<merged><file path="/dialog.xml"><dialogs>
	<character id="dealer">
		<statement id="new_player" link="try_game">Want to try your hand at the Mighty Action Force trading card game?</statement>
    
    	<conversation id="try_game">
    		<exchange>
    			<question triggerEventArgs="check_if_played" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Sure!</question>
    		</exchange>
    		<exchange>
    			<question>Not now.</question>
    		</exchange>
    	</conversation>
    	
    	<statement id="give_starter" triggerEventArgs="give_deck" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Here's a starter pack.</statement>
    	<statement id="dealer_teach" triggerEventArgs="play_dealer" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">I'll teach you how to play.</statement>
    	<!-- <statement event="starter_deck" link="play_again">You may be able to find more cards around the con.</statement> -->
    	
    	<statement event="starter_deck" link="replay">Want to play again?</statement>
    	<conversation id="replay">
    		<exchange>
    			<question>Sure, why not.</question>
    			<answer triggerEventArgs="play_dealer" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Great, let's get started.</answer>
    		</exchange>
    		<exchange>
    			<question>Not now.</question>
    		</exchange>
    	</conversation>
    	
    	<statement id="won_card" link="explain_deck">Great game! That card should help strengthen your deck.</statement>
    	<statement id="explain_deck" triggerEventArgs="open_deck" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">You can reorganize cards with your Card Deck item. Try swapping in the card you just won.</statement>
    	<statement id="deck_closed" link="lookout">Remember to update your deck when you get new cards</statement>
    	<statement id="lookout">and keep a look out, you never know where cards might be hiding.</statement>
    
    </character>
    
    <character id="player">
    	<statement id="lost_to_expert">She's right, maybe I can find more cards around the con.</statement>
    </character>
    
    <character id="expert">
    	<statement>My deck is so good I don't even need to use my new Omegon card.</statement>
		<statement event="starter_deck" link="question">Beat my epic deck and I'll give you an unreleased Omegon card.</statement>
		<statement event="omegon_body_photo" link="question">I can't believe I lost. Best out of 3?</statement>
		<conversation id="question">
			<exchange>
				<question>You're on.</question>
				<answer triggerEventArgs="play_expert" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Prepare for a world of hurt.</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>I'll pass for now.</question>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
    	<statement id="lost">How did you beat me! This is impossible!</statement>
    	<statement id="won">You'll never beat me with cards like that in your deck.</statement>
    </character>
    
    <character id="marksman">
    	<statement>I love the Mighty Action Force! I want to get all of their cards!</statement>
    </character>
</dialogs></file><file path="/doors.xml"><doors>

<merged><file path="/dialog.xml"><dialogs>
	<character id="player">
		<statement id="gotIt" triggerEventArgs="give_back_phone" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Got it!</statement>
		<statement id="locked">Hmm. Not open yet...</statement>
		<statement linkEntityId="forrest" id="need" link="we_need">So what do you need?</statement>
		<statement linkEntityId="forrest" id="i_spy" link="def">Can I be a spy?</statement>
	</character>
	<character id="costume">
		<statement id="ask_tutorial" link="tutorial">Great to see you again. Do you want to learn how to costumize?</statement>
		<conversation id="tutorial">
			<exchange>
				<question triggerEventArgs="start_tutorial" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Yes.</question>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question triggerEventArgs="no_tutorial" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">No thanks.</question>
				<answer>Make sure you save your current look if you don't want to lose any of the parts.</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
		<statement>Make sure you save your current look if you don't want to lose any of the parts.</statement>
		<statement id="tutorial_done">Make sure you save your current look if you don't want to lose any of the parts.</statement>
    </character>
	<character id="forrest">
		<statement id="comere" link="spies">hey kid, come over here for a second. I want to talk to you about an amazing opportunity!</statement>
		<statement linkEntityId="player" id="spies" link="need">Wicked Cool News relies on spies to get us inside information -- but we know almost nothing about the Mighty Action Force movie!</statement>
		<statement linkEntityId="player" id="we_need" link="i_spy">We need to be the first site to post what Omegon looks like before the trailer premieres. The information has to be scattered around here somewhere.</statement>
		<statement id="def" triggerEventArgs="givePhone" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Definitely. Here's a phone. Get photos of Omegon and I'll help you put together an amazing costume!</statement>
		<statement id="get_photos">Get photos of Omegon and I'll help you put together an amazing costume!</statement>
		<statement id="scoop" link="deal">What a scoop! This is going up right away -- with a spoiler alert, obviously.</statement>
		<statement id="deal" triggerEventArgs="getCostume" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">I didn't forget our deal. Give me a minute and I'll whip up a prize-winning costume for you.</statement>
		<statement id="here_you_go" triggerEventArgs="giveCostume" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Here you go!</statement>
		<statement id="nice_costume">That's a really nice costume!</statement>
    </character>
	<character id="stan">
		<conversation>
			<exchange>
				<question>Any idea where I can find out what Omegon looks like in the Mighty Action Force movie?</question>
				<answer>Geez, another one? Someone else was just here trying to sell me on behind-the-scenes shots of Omegon.</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>Who else was looking for Omegon?</question>
				<answer>Sasha Capone -- the webmaster of Wicked Cool News' biggest rival, Totally Rad News.</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>What does she look like?</question>
				<answer triggerEventArgs="turn_stan" link="there" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Blonde hair, glasses, ponytail, and a red leather jacket.</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
		<statement id="there" triggerEventArgs="show_sasha" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">There she is over there.</statement>
		<statement id="everyone">Everyone wants to know what Omegon looks like.</statement>
    </character>
	<character id="pizza">
		<statement>This costume finally came in handy. They let me in for free!</statement>
    </character>
	<character id="eahero1">
		<statement>These miniatures are amazing!</statement>
    </character>
	<character id="sasha">
		<statement>This conference is just loaded with Rad News.</statement>
    </character>
</dialogs></file><file path="/doors.xml"><doors>

<merged><file path="/dialog.xml"><dialogs>
	<character id="player">
		<statement id="wait">wait, I need to talk to you!</statement>
		<statement id="where">Where did she go?</statement>
		<statement id="there">There she is.</statement>
		<statement id="maze0">This place is like a maze! every hallway looks the same.</statement>

		<statement id="maze2">This hallway looks familiar, or not?</statement>
		<statement id="maze3">Maybe i should retrace my steps.</statement>
		<statement id="maze4">This hall looks familiar...</statement>
		<statement id="maze5">Who designed these crazy hallways?</statement>
    </character>
    <character id="person5">
		<statement>I'm going to miss all the events because of this place!</statement>
	</character>

<merged><file path="/dialog.xml"><dialogs>
	<character id="sasha">
		<conversation>
			<exchange>
				<question>Excuse me, are you Sasha Capone?</question>
				<answer>I may be. Who's asking?</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>Someone in the market for a picture of Omegon. I heard you have one.</question>
				<answer>You heard right, kemosabe. What will you give me for it?</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>I could maybe scrounge up some loose change...</question>
				<answer triggerEventArgs="sasha_card, sasha" triggerEvent="giveItem">When you've got a real offer, call me. Here's my card.</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
		
		<statement id="preview" triggerEventArgs="sasha_left_lobby, true" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">The closed-door preview is starting now? I'll be there!</statement>
		<statement id="okay" triggerEventArgs="phone_in_box, true" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Okay, here you go.</statement>
    </character>
    
    <character id="player">
   		<statement id="noSignal">No signal!</statement>
   		<statement id="noPhone">Can't call someone without a phone!</statement>
   		<statement id="gotPhoto">Got it! I'll just text myself this photo.</statement>
   		<statement id="noTouch">I don't know which phone is sasha's.</statement>
   		<statement id="noTouch2">I already have the photo from her phone.</statement>
   		<statement id="noTouch3">Full of cell phones, who would have guessed?</statement>
   		<statement id="okaythen">Wow, some people really get into their characters...</statement>
   	</character>
   	
    <character id="guard">
   		<statement linkEntityId="sasha" id="phonePlease" link="okay">Place your phone in the bin before you go in.</statement>
   		<statement id="noEntry">Hey! Press members only, move along.</statement>
   		<statement id="guardNoSignal">I get no service. No service, I tell you. Lousy network!</statement>
   		<statement id="whatSignal">Hey, someone's network is getting service here, amazing!</statement>
   		<statement>Brand new Tech Lounge down the hall, but i'm stuck here by this bin with no service!</statement>
    </character>
    
    <character id="wizard">
   		<statement>My drink got stuck! I hate these machines!</statement>
   		<statement id="soda">That's not my soda!</statement>
   		<statement event="tipped_soda_machine">The machine's still not working!</statement>
   	</character>
   	
   	<character id="computer">
   		<statement>This is the only place in this whole building I get a connection!</statement>
   	</character>
   	
   	<character id="pinataMan">
   		<statement linkEntityId="player" id="pin0" link="okaythen">Pinata-Man is ever vigilant!</statement>
   		<statement linkEntityId="player" id="pin1" link="okaythen">Nothing escapes Pinata-Man's gaze.</statement>
   		<statement linkEntityId="player" id="pin2" link="okaythen">Worry not citizen, Pinata-man is here!</statement>
   	</character>
   	
   	<character id="card2">

   		<statement event="starter_deck" link="question">A fellow Mighty Action Force fan? Want to play?</statement>
   		<statement link="action">Have you heard about the Mighty Action Force Trading Card Game? its great!</statement>
   		<statement id="action">They are giving out free starter decks in the demo hall, you should try it!</statement>
   		
   		<statement triggeredByEvent="lose">Better luck next time.</statement>
   		<statement triggeredByEvent="win">I can't believe I lost!</statement>

   		<conversation id="question">
			<exchange>
				<question>Sure.</question>
				<answer triggerEventArgs="play_card2" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Lets play!</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>No thanks.</question>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
    </character>
</dialogs></file><file path="/doors.xml"><doors>

<merged><file path="/dialog.xml"><dialogs>
	<character id="player">
		<statement id="what_contest" triggerEventArgs="emcee_gesture" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">What contest?</statement>
		<statement linkEntityId="emcee" id="omegon" link="nobody_knows">Omegon? What does he look like?</statement>
		<statement id="locked">Hmm. Locked...</statement>
		<statement id="get_ready" triggerEventArgs="run_off" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">All right!</statement>
    </character>
	<character id="emcee">
		<statement linkEntityId="player" id="dramatic" link="what_contest">Dramatic entrance, but your timing's off. The contest doesn't start for a little while.</statement>
		<statement id="whoever">Whoever comes up with the best Omegon costume will win a walk-on role in the Mighty Action Force sequel.</statement>
		<statement>Whoever comes up with the best Omegon costume will win a walk-on role in the Mighty Action Force sequel.</statement>
		
		<statement id="welcome" link="today">Welcome to the PoptropiCon costume contest.</statement>
		<statement id="today" triggerEventArgs="cheer1" link="hear_it" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Today's winner will win a walk-on role in the next Mighty Action Force movie.</statement>
		<statement id="hear_it" triggerEventArgs="enter_contestant_1" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Let's hear it for contestant #1!</statement>
		<statement id="terrible" triggerEventArgs="enter_contestant_2" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Terrible. Just terrible. Next up is contestant #2!</statement>
		<statement id="unfortunate" triggerEventArgs="enter_player" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Wow, that's unfortunate. All right, let's get this over with. Contestant #3?</statement>
		<statement id="pretty_good" link="winner">Hey, that's actually pretty good! I can't believe it!</statement>
		<statement id="winner" triggerEventArgs="enter_omegon" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">No reason to prolong this. The winner of the costume contest is --</statement>
		
		<statement linkEntityId="omegon" id="amazing" triggerEventArgs="shake3" link="bow" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Amazing! A surprise contestant -- and what a costume! I don't even see any seams.</statement>
		<statement linkEntityId="omegon" id="terrific" triggerEventArgs="shake4" link="destroy" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Haha, terrific. Well, I don't need to see any more. We have a winner!</statement>
		<statement id="milk" triggerEventArgs="omegon_glow" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">No need to milk it. Let's get you your prize. You, sir, should unmask.</statement>
		<statement id="no_mask" triggerEventArgs="omegon_attack" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">No mask? No mask!</statement>
		<statement id="ahh">Ahh!</statement>
		
		<statement id="get_ready" triggerEventArgs="get_ready" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">You should put on your costume, the contest is about to begin.</statement>
		<statement id="after_contest">Your costume was good, but that last guy's was amazing!</statement>
    </character>
	<character id="omegon">
		<statement linkEntityId="emcee" id="bow" link="terrific">Bow to Omegon!</statement>
		<statement linkEntityId="emcee" id="destroy" link="milk">I have come to destroy the Mighty Action Force.</statement>
		<statement linkEntityId="emcee" id="no_mask" link="no_mask">I wear no mask.</statement>
    </character>
	<character id="superhero">
		<statement>That's the prize of a lifetime! Who will make the best Omegon costume?</statement>
		<statement id="hehheh">Heh heh...</statement>
		<statement id="hmm">Hmm...</statement>
		<statement id="ooh">Ooh...</statement>
		<statement id="ahh">Ahh!</statement>
		<statement id="after_contest">I don't really know what to think about that contest...</statement>
    </character>
	<character id="viking">
		<statement>Nobody knows what Omegon looks like in the movie. The filmmakers have kept everything under wraps.</statement>
		<statement id="after_contest">I love omegon!</statement>
    </character>
	<character id="hippie">
		<statement>The card games at these conventions are always the best. I can't wait!</statement>
		<statement event="starter_deck" link="question">Just got to play the Mighty Action Force card game, and it was really fun! Want to play?</statement>
		<conversation id="question">
			<exchange>
				<question>Sure.</question>
				<answer triggerEventArgs="play_hippie" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Lets play!</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>No thanks.</question>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
		<statement id="after_contest">That contest was the best show of the con!</statement>
    </character>
	<character id="contestant1">
		<statement id="ahh">Ahh!</statement>
    </character>
	<character id="contestant2">
		<statement id="ahh">Ahh!</statement>
    </character>

<file path="/dialog.xml"><dialogs>
    <character id="player">
    	<statement id="happen">What happened?</statement>
    	<statement id="night">What a nightmare!</statement>
    
		<statement linkEntityId="fan" id="defeat" link="duh">How did the Mighty Action Force defeat Omegon?</statement>
		<statement linkEntityId="fan" id="what" link="comic">Uh.. so what are we supposed to do?</statement>
		
		<statement id="weapons">This is it.</statement>
		<statement id="yes">No doubt about it. These are all of the Mighty Action Force weapons.</statement>
		
		<statement id="months">How could you?</statement>
		<statement id="offer">What happens now? What kind of a deal did Omegon offer you?</statement>
		
		<statement id="doom">We're doomed!</statement>
		<statement id="where">Where can can I find the Omega Crystal?</statement>
		<statement id="noble">That's uncharacteristically noble of you.</statement>
    </character>
    
	<character id="leader">
		<statement id="intro">We thought you'd never wake up!</statement>	
		<statement id="taken">Omegon has taken over the convention. This basement room is all that's left of the human resistance.</statement>
		<statement id="sadly">Sadly, this is all too real.</statement>
		<statement id="bearings">Get your bearings and then come talk to me when you're ready...</statement>
		
		<conversation>
			<exchange>
				<question>Tell me you have a plan.</question>
				<answer>If we gather the Mighty Action Force Weapons, we have a fighting chance to defeat Omegon.</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>What are the Mighty Action Force Weapons?</question>
				<answer>There are three: Elf Archer's bow, Goldface's electron pulse, and World Guy's shield.</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>How will I recognize them?</question>
				<answer>My second-in-command will give you a comic page that should help.</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
		
		<statement id="sure">You're sure? This is all of it?</statement>
		<statement id="betray">In that case... we are here, my lord!</statement>
		
		<statement id="sorry">I'm sorry. This was the only way.</statement>
		<statement id="time">For months we've been living underground, barely scraping by. It was only a matter of time before Omegon got to us, too!</statement>
		<statement id="power">In exchange for giving up the resistance, he's promised me the powers of Alphaon. Omegon... I am ready!</statement>
		<statement id="no">What? No! I did everything you asked!</statement>
    </character>
    
    <character id="fan">
		<statement linkEntityId="player" link="defeat">This is just like the "Reign of Omegon" arc from issues 172-178!</statement>
		<statement linkEntityId="player" id="duh" link="what">Duh -- they summoned Alphaon.</statement>
		<statement id="comic" triggerEventArgs="show_comic178" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Don't you understand anything? It's all right here!</statement>
<!-- <statement id="comic" triggerEvent="giveItem" triggerEventArgs="comic178, fan">Don't you understand anything? It's all right here!</statement> -->
		
		<statement event="gotItem_comic178">It's all explained in the comic. Go figure it out.</statement>
		
		<statement id="alphaon">Alphaon, here we come!</statement>
		<statement id="ripoff" forceOnScreen="true">Wait a minute, this isn't what happened in the comic. What a rip-off!</statement>
		<statement id="crystal" triggerEventArgs="show_comic367" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" forceOnScreen="true">Not so fast. In issue #367, the Mighty Action Force sent Omegon back to his home dimension by overloading the Omega Crystal. Take a look!</statement>
		<statement id="throne">It's in Omegon's throne room. You go. I'll hold them off!</statement>
		<statement id="heroic">The heroic sacrifice -- it's what Stan Ditko would have wanted.</statement>
    </character>
    
    <character id="omegon">
		<statement id="futile">Resistance is futile.</statement>
		<statement id="plant">Take her to the processing plant.</statement>
		<statement id="reign">The reign of Omegon is here. Welcome to your doom.</statement>
    </character>
    
    
    <character id="survivor1">
    	<statement>I can't even remember life before Omegon.</statement>
		<statement event="starter_deck" link="play">I can't even remember life before Omegon. All i do is play MAF cards now.</statement>
		<conversation id="play">
    		<exchange>
    			<question triggerEventArgs="play_hippie" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Lets play!</question>
    		</exchange>
    		<exchange>
    			<question>Not now.</question>
    		</exchange>
    	</conversation>
		
    </character>
    <character id="survivor2">
        <statement>Playing the Mighty Action Force card game is the only joy I have left.</statement>
		<statement event="starter_deck" link="play">Playing the Mighty Action Force card game is the only joy I have left.</statement>
			<conversation id="play">
    		<exchange>
    			<question triggerEventArgs="play_card2" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Lets play!</question>
    		</exchange>
    		<exchange>
    			<question>Not now.</question>
    		</exchange>
    	</conversation>
    </character>
    
    <character id="goldFace">
    	<statement event="hasItem_gauntlets">Boy, I thought those Goldface fanboys were nuts. This Omegon is on another level!</statement>
		<statement link="give_gaunts">Boy, I thought those Goldface fanboys were nuts. This Omegon is on another level!</statement>
		<statement id="give_gaunts" triggerEventArgs="gauntlets, goldface" triggerEvent="giveItem">You can have my electron pulse gauntlets. they'd shoot sparks if the rechargeable batteries weren't dead.</statement>
		<statement id="again">Not again!</statement>
    </character>
    
    <character id="elfArcher">
        <statement event="hasItem_bow">I tried to explain that I never even shot an arrow in the movie. My stunt double did!</statement>
		<statement link="give_bow">I tried to explain that I never even shot an arrow in the movie. My stunt double did!</statement>
		<statement id="give_bow" triggerEventArgs="bow, elfArcher" triggerEvent="giveItem">Take this replica elf archer bow. i don't know how to shoot it anyway.</statement>
    </character>
    
    <character id="worldGuy">
        <statement event="hasItem_shield">Stardom isn't all fast cars and good times. Sometimes you get kidnapped by a robot from another dimension.</statement>
		<statement link="give_shield">Stardom isn't all fast cars and good times. Sometimes you get kidnapped by a robot from another dimension.</statement>
   		<statement id="give_shield" triggerEventArgs="shield, worldGuy" triggerEvent="giveItem">Here, take my shield. makes a good mirror to check your hair with.</statement>
    </character>
    
    <character id="dealer">
		<statement link="try_game">All we have left from the convention are Mighty Action Force starter packs. Want another one?</statement>
    
    	<conversation id="try_game">
    		<exchange>
    			<question triggerEventArgs="check_if_played" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Sure!</question>
    		</exchange>
    		<exchange>
    			<question>Not now.</question>
    		</exchange>
    	</conversation>
    	
    	<statement id="give_starter" triggerEventArgs="give_deck" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Here's a starter pack. May it take your mind off of our daily misery.</statement>
    	<statement id="dealer_teach" triggerEventArgs="play_dealer" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">I'll teach you how to play.</statement>
    	<!-- <statement event="starter_deck" link="play_again">You may be able to find more cards around the con.</statement> -->
    	
    	<statement event="starter_deck" link="replay">Want to play again?</statement>
    	<conversation id="replay">
    		<exchange>
    			<question>Sure, why not.</question>
    			<answer triggerEventArgs="play_dealer" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Great, let's get started.</answer>
    		</exchange>
    		<exchange>
    			<question>Not now.</question>
    		</exchange>
    	</conversation>
    	
    	<statement id="won_card" link="explain_deck">Great game! That card should help strengthen your deck.</statement>
    	<statement id="explain_deck" triggerEventArgs="open_deck" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">You can reorganize cards with your Card Deck item. Try swapping in the card you just won.</statement>
    	<statement id="deck_closed">Remember to update your deck when you get new cards</statement>
    </character>
    
</dialogs></file>

<file path="/dialog.xml"><dialogs>
    <character id="player">
		<statement id="power">exposed wiring, i wouldn't touch that without hand protection.</statement>
		<statement id="charged">I already charged the electron pulse gauntlets.</statement>
    </character>

	<character id="wizard">
		<statement id="soda">But I finally found myself a drink!</statement>
		<statement id="now">Oh boy, now what's happening?</statement>
		<statement event="machine_broken">Someone help me, i'm stuck!</statement>
		<statement id="help">Someone help me, i'm stuck!</statement>
		<statement id="thanks">I'm free! Thanks!</statement>
		<statement id="here" triggerEventArgs="got_soda_" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">...you know, after all that I'm not even thirsty anymore. You can have this.</statement>
    </character>
    <character id="pinata">
		<statement id="tyrants">Pinata-Man will never surrender to tyrants!</statement>
    </character>
    
    <character id="goldFace">
    	<statement>Call my agent! My publicist! My stylist! Anyone! </statement>
		<statement id="help">Call my agent! My publicist! My stylist! Anyone!</statement>
		<statement id="freedom">Finally! This cage was harder to escape than my modeling contract!</statement>
    </character>
    
    <character id="hench0">
		<statement id="bio">Stupid machine stole our biomass!</statement>

    </character>

<merged>
	
<file path="/dialog.xml"><dialogs>
	<character id="worldGuy">
		<statement>Just do one con appearance, they said. We'll give you a 10k per diem, they said.</statement>
		<statement id="one_appearance">Just do one con appearance, they said. We'll give you a 10k per diem, they said.</statement>
		<statement id="back_to_broadway">I'm going back to Broadway!</statement>
	</character>

    <character id="player">
    	<statement id="lost_shield">My shield melted! I guess things weren't better in the old days.</statement>
    	
    	<statement id="strike_back">That crystal looks ready to shatter.</statement>
    	<statement id="pre_soda">What a weird, alien machine. Maybe there are more of these power containers around.</statement>
    	<statement id="try_soda">Well, they say these things give you enough energy to lift a horse.</statement>
    	
    	<statement id="needs_more_soda">Looks like there's room for more cans.</statement>
    	
    	<statement id="soda1">Wow, I can't believe that worked.</statement>
    	<statement id="soda2">Honestly, what do they put in this stuff?</statement>
    	
    	<statement id="needs_more_damage" forceOnScreen="true">That crystal doesn't look ready to crumble just yet.</statement>
    	<statement id="banished_omegon">I did it! I banished Omegon!</statement>
    </character>
    
    <character id="omegon">
    	<statement id="chit_chat1">The hour is at hand, my faithful hench-bots.</statement>
    	<statement id="chit_chat2">Soon, the powers of the Mighty Action Force will be mine!</statement>
    	<statement id="chit_chat3">We shall discard their withered husks on the trash heap of history.</statement>
    	<statement id="chit_chat4">This world, like so many wretched spheres before it, will be reborn in the light of Omegon!</statement>
    	<statement id="chit_chat5">No one can face us. Not the Mighty Action Force, not some random kid in a hot dog suit.</statement>
    	<statement id="chit_chat6">Make ready, my servants. Your glory awaits.</statement>
    	
    	<statement id="wonder1">Mmmm, I love this chair's massage feature.</statement>
    	<statement id="wonder2">Is it getting brighter in here, maybe louder, or is it just me?</statement>
    	<statement id="wonder3">What was that noise?!</statement>
    	
    	<statement id="what_was_that">What was that noise?!</statement>
    	<statement id="foolish_child">You didn't think it would be that easy, did you?</statement>
    	<statement id="my_power">Now I will show you real power!</statement>
    </character>
    
    <character id="henchbot1">
    	<statement id="no_idea">My Lord Omegon, be careful!</statement>
    </character>
</dialogs></file>
