<file path="/dialog.xml"><dialogs>
	<character id="player">
		<statement linkEntityId="cam" id="whatsGoingOn" triggerEventArgs="playerSaidWhatsGoingOn" link="needHelp" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">What's going on?</statement>
		<statement id="locked">Locked, I'll need the key to open this.</statement>
		<statement id="alreadyGotInk">I already got the ink.</statement>
		<statement id="cantUseThatHere">I can't use that here.</statement>
		<statement id="closer">I need to get closer to use that.</statement>

    </character>
	<character id="cam">
		<statement id="needHelp" triggerEventArgs="camSaidNeedHelp" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">I need help filming some underwater footage of these fish.</statement>
		<statement id="findKey" triggerEventArgs="camCompletedInitialSpeech" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Find the key to the sub and we'll make the greatest fish story ever told!</statement>
		<statement id="success" triggerEventArgs="camSaidSuccessSpeech" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Success! You take the sub and I'll keep in touch by radio.</statement>
		<statement event="cam_said_why_speech">Get the key to that box and you can take the sub down. We'll make the greatest fish story ever!</statement>
		<statement event="hasItem_key">Great you have the key! Use it on the box.</statement>  
		<statement id="subOpen">Ok, now get into the sub and start your undersea voyage!</statement>
	</character>
	<character id="sailor1">
		<statement>We can't let Cam back into the sub. It's for his own safety!</statement>
    </character>
    <character id="sailor2">
		<!-- <statement>Can't let you have this key. The safety of the crew is at stake.</statement>  -->
		<statement linkEntityId="sailor2" id="water" link="water2">Hey! Watch it!</statement>
		<statement id="water2" triggerEventArgs="sailorDoneReactingToWater" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Well, it's just water... it won't stain.</statement>	
		<!-- <statement event="gotItem_key">What do you want? You already got the key from me.</statement>   -->
		<statement event="gotItem_key">Where did that key go? I can't see a thing!</statement>
		<statement event="sailor_reacted_to_ink">Where did that key go? I can't see a thing!</statement>	
		<statement id="dumpedInk" triggerEventArgs="sailor_reacted_to_ink,true" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Ack! My beautiful helmet!</statement>
		
		<conversation>
			<exchange>
				<question>What are you doing in the middle of the ocean?</question>
				<answer>We're on an expedition for Cam Jameson's fish film. Whether he'll finish it is another story.</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>Is that the key to the sub?</question>
				<answer>Yes, but I can't let you have it. The safety of the crew is at stake.</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
		
    </character>
	<character id="sailor3">
		<statement>Cam loses all track of time when he's down there. He could wreck the equipment.</statement>
    </character>
</dialogs></file>

	<file path="/dialog.xml">
		<dialogs>
			<character id="player">
				<statement id="job" link="no" linkEntityId="prince">So you want me to get you a job?</statement>
				<statement id="love" link="seems" linkEntityId="amelia">Okay then we have to find her true love.</statement>
				<statement id="no_use_goat">That's one smelly goat.</statement>
				<statement triggeredByEvent="wrong_end">nope.</statement>
				<statement id="back" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="return">I should head back to town.</statement>
				<statement id="poem" link="dark">It's a pretty bad poem, but I think it leads to a catacomb in the castle!</statement>
				<statement id="dark" link="treasury" linkEntityId="prince">Dark, full of gold, you know it?</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="amelia">
				<statement link="screaming">Thank goodness you're here! I've tried every remedy!</statement>
				<statement id="screaming" link="kiss">Screaming, shaking, heavy metal, and she won't wake up!</statement>
				<statement id="kiss" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="amelia_intro_end,true">These guys are convinced only the kiss of a prince will wake her. Will you find him?</statement>
				<statement event="amelia_intro_end">Find that prince!</statement>
				<conversation event="talked_to_king">
					<exchange>
						<question>A creepy magic guy has stolen everyone's happy endings! He gave me magic lipstick to break the spell...</question>
						<answer link="love" linkEntityId="player">Hmm if there's one thing I've learned about magic dudes, it's that you shouldn't trust anything they say.</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement id="seems" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="find_true_love, true">It would seem so. All of you, what can you tell us about what she truly loves?</statement>
				<statement event="find_true_love">I bet there's something around here she loves. Find it!</statement>
				<statement event="complete_snowwhite">Sure was lucky you showed up!</statement>
				<conversation event="start_rumpelstiltskin">
					<exchange>
						<question>He turned into a smoke monster and got away! He tricked us!</question>
						<answer link="bright">That's unfortunate. Told ya, can't trust magic dudes.</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement id="bright" link="back">But look on the bright side, you gave all these people new happy endings!</statement>
				<statement id="back" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="complete_rumpelstiltskin, true">He'll come back someday, they always do, but today you've saved the day!</statement>
				<statement event="complete_rumpelstiltskin">If I've ever learned anything about bad guys in Poptropica, it's that they always come back. Keep an eye out for that one.</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="prince">
				<conversation>
					<exchange>
						<question>Hey I... uh... need you to come kiss this lady...</question>
						<answer link="dad">Woe is me! I'm filled with too much sorrow!</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement id="dad" link="job" linkEntityId="player">My dad says I'll never rule if I can't get a job!</statement>
				<statement id="no" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="talked_to_prince,true">No! I'm a prince, I don't work! Talk some sense into my old man!</statement>
				<statement event="talked_to_prince">Talk some sense into my old man!</statement>
				<statement event="talked_to_king">And now my dad is an alien! I'll never be king!</statement>
				<statement event="start_rumpelstiltskin">Where's my real dad!</statement>
				<conversation event="rumples_quest_step3_started">
					<exchange>
						<question>I've found a clue that could lead us to your father!</question>
						<answer link="poem" linkEntityId="player">You did! What is it?!</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement id="treasury" link="coming">That sounds like the treasury! I have a key!</statement>
				<statement id="coming" triggerEvent="loadScene" triggerEventArgs="game.scenes.fairytale.treasury.Treasury">We're coming Pa-pa!</statement>
				<conversation event="saved_king">
					<exchange>
						<question>Why are you still crying? We saved your dad.</question>
						<answer link="chores" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="chores">Ma-ma is coming home! She's so... so... waaahh!</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<conversation event="chores">
					<exchange>
						<question>She can't be that bad.</question>
						<answer>She's a conqueror! I don't wanna conquer! I want to eat fancy cakes!</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
			</character>
			<character id="red">
				<statement link="rich">Where have these guys been all my life!</statement>
				<statement id="rich">I'm going to be rich!</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="cinder">
				<statement>I think this guy gets me, ya know?</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="snow">
				<statement>Who's a good boy! No more pizza for you! No!</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="huntsman">
				<statement>You were so right! I'll never have to threaten grannies again!</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="wolf">
				<statement>Woof!</statement>
			</character>
		</dialogs>
	</file>

		<dialogs>
			<character id="player">
				<statement id="look" link="genius" linkEntityId="pig">Look! A talking pig!</statement>
				<statement id="trenchcoat" link="help_snow" linkEntityId="dwarfs">You look like a bunch of dwarves in a trenchcoat.</statement>
				<statement id="tie" link="please" linkEntityId="npcRumpleQuest">...What's with all the stuff?</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="pig">
				<statement link="look" linkEntityId="player">It's my lunch break, pal.</statement>
				<statement id="genius" triggerEventArgs="talked_to_pig,true" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" link="weird">Look, it's a kid genius.</statement>
				<statement id="weird" link="lost">I'm supposed to tell all you adventurer types something weird is going on.</statement>
				<statement id="lost" link="help">The people of fairy tale island have lost their happy endings.</statement>
				<statement id="help">They need your help. Now get outta here, this is me time.</statement>
				<statement event="talked_to_pig">Beat it!</statement>
				<statement event="complete_rumpelstiltskin">Look, it's a kid hero.</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="red">
				<conversation>
					<exchange>
						<question>I heard you lost your happy ending?</question>
						<answer link="help_red">I don't know about that, but I've been all over the forest trying to deliver this pizza for days.</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement id="help_red" triggerEventArgs="start_redridinghood,true" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">This wolf has chased me out each time, think you can help?</statement>
				<statement event="start_redridinghood" triggerEventArgs="start_redridinghood" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Time is money, let's get going!</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="dwarfs">
				<conversation>
					<exchange>
						<question>Uh who are you supposed to be?</question>
						<answer link="normal">Why we... I mean I!</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement id="normal" link="trenchcoat" linkEntityId="player">I am a normal Poptropican in need of some assistance!</statement>
				<statement id="help_snow" triggerEventArgs="start_snowwhite,true" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Adventurers walk right past us, so we dressed up! Will you help us wake up Snow White?</statement>
				<statement event="start_snowwhite" triggerEventArgs="start_snowwhite" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">We still need to wake up Snow White!</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="godmother">
				<conversation>
					<exchange>
						<question>What happy ending are you missing?</question>
						<answer link="help_cinderella">It's Cinderella, she'll never make it to the ball!</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement id="help_cinderella" triggerEventArgs="start_cinderella,true" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Will you help get her there?</statement>
				<statement event="start_cinderella" triggerEventArgs="start_cinderella" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">She'll never make it! Please help!</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="npcRumpleQuest">
				<conversation>
					<exchange>
						<question link="tie" linkEntityId="player" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="setAnim-player-Grief">You!</question>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement id="please" link="quest">I can travel anywhere on Poptropica now! No prison can contain me!</statement>
				<statement id="quest" link="why">Before I leave again, I have a quest for you!</statement>
				<conversation id="why">
					<exchange>
						<question>Why would I help you?!</question>
						<answer link="king">You mean why help me again? Ha! You won't be helping me, simply amusing me.</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement id="king" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="rumple_quest_declined,true" link="response">You see, I know where the Fairy Tale King is, and I want you to find him.</statement>
				<conversation id="response">
					<exchange>
						<question>Fine, I'll bite. Where is he?</question>
						<answer triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="rumples_quest_member_check">Hear my riddle well!</answer>
					</exchange>
					<exchange>
						<question>No way I'm amusing you.</question>
						<answer triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="setLabel-npcRumpleQuest-smoke">Ha! Suit yourself!</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement lockInput="true" triggeredByEvent="is_member" link="gl" triggerEventArgs="rumpleRiddle" triggerEvent="giveQuestItem">...Well, nevermind, let me write it down for your puny brain.</statement>
				<statement triggeredByEvent="non_member" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="rumple_quest_declined">...Well, nevermind, come back when you are a member.</statement>
				<statement lockInput="true" id="gl" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="start_rumples_quest,true,hub" link="hehe">Good luck, little adventurer.</statement>
				<statement id="hehe" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="setLabel-npcRumpleQuest-smoke">Ha ha ha.</statement>
				<statement event="rumple_quest_declined" link="response2">Ready to find the little King of Fairy Tale?</statement>
				<conversation id="response2">
					<exchange>
						<question>Fine. Where is he?</question>
						<answer  triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="rumples_quest_member_check">Hear my riddle well!</answer>
					</exchange>
					<exchange>
						<question>Buzz off.</question>
						<answer triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="setLabel-npcRumpleQuest-smoke">Ha! Suit yourself!</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement event="rumples_quest_step1_started">You can't figure it out? You're truly a fool of "mythological" proportions...</statement>
				<statement event="rumples_quest_step2_started">You need help deciphering the riddle? I simply don't have "time" for this...</statement>
				<statement event="rumples_quest_step3_started">Ha ha ha! You can't make heads or "tales" of the final riddle can you?</statement>
			</character>
		</dialogs>
	</file>

	<file path="/dialog.xml">
		<dialogs>
			<character id="player">
				<statement id="insult1">I'm not sure we can get your dad out of here.</statement>
				<statement id="insult2">Real jobs teach character.</statement>
				<statement id="insult3">Fairy Tale is hardly an island; I beat it in 5 minutes.</statement>
				<statement id="insult4">Cinder is my favorite character on the whole island.</statement>
				<statement id="insult5">You’ll have to pay taxes this year.</statement>
				<statement id="insult6">I can basically make my clubhouse into a castle.</statement>
				<statement id="insult7">I bet, with the credits I get for this, I can buy one outfit in the store.</statement>
				<statement id="insult8">Royalty is an outdated construct.</statement>
				<statement id="insult9">Mythology is my favorite island.</statement>
				<statement id="insult10">I should just wait for them to bring back old islands.</statement>
				<statement id="insult11">Ya know, it took me about a week to break out of Pelican Rock.</statement>
				<statement id="insult12">Where's Amelia when you need her?</statement>
				<statement id="insult13">With all the gold down here, couldn't you pay a locksmith?</statement>
				<statement id="insult14">I bet he's just Rumpel in disguise again.</statement>
				<statement id="insult15">Maybe that dragon can break down the door. He'd be ok... probably.</statement>
				<statement id="insult16">The floor is getting pretty slippery around here...</statement>
				<statement id="insult17">How much of this gold is mine at the end of all this?</statement>
				<statement id="insult18">I don't suppose you have super strength and can just pry the door open?</statement>
				<statement id="insult19">I get to see the rest of the castle right?</statement>
				<statement id="insult20">What if you're Rumpelstiltskin in disguise...</statement>
				<statement id="well" link="why" linkEntityId="prince">Well that's one mystery solved</statement>
				<statement id="geez" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="complete_rumples_quest,true,hub">Aww geez.</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="prince">
				<statement id="callout1">Pa-pa!</statement>
				<statement id="callout2">Pa-pa, where are you?</statement>
				<statement id="callout3">We're coming Pa-pa!</statement>
				<statement id="cry" link="foundKing" linkEntityId="king">Oh Pa-pa! I thought I'd never see you again!</statement>
				<statement id="dragon">Our dragon's up ahead. We should leave his gold alone or he'll wake up...mad!</statement>
				<statement id="dad" link="son" linkEntityId="king">Pa-pa!</statement>
				<statement id="why" link="news" linkEntityId="king">But Pa-pa, why don't you look happy!</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="king">
				<statement>You found me!</statement>
				<statement event="foundKing" link="crybaby">That's it! Keep making him cry on those panels!</statement>
				<statement id="crybaby">Let his fragile, crybaby disposition chariot me to freedom!</statement>
				<statement id="son" link="well" linkEntityId="player">Son!</statement>
				<statement id="news" link="queen">As Rumpelstiltskin locked me away, he gave me grave news.</statement>
				<statement id="queen" link="mom">The Queen..</statement>
				<statement id="mom" link="back">...Your mother...</statement>
				<statement id="back" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="endSequence">...is on her way back to the castle.</statement>
			</character>
		</dialogs>
	</file>

	<file path="/dialog.xml">
		<dialogs>
			<character id="player">
				<!--<statement id="anyone">Hmm so the doctor could be anyone on the island, not just a "bland" person.</statement>-->
				<statement triggeredByEvent="gotItem_broken_device" link="show">This thing is broken, but a book of matches from The Crazy Club sounds like a lead.</statement>
				<statement id="show">I should show this to Detective Gram.</statement>
				<statement triggeredByEvent="cant_use_leaf_blower">I don't think this is of any use here.</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="mayor">
				<conversation>
					<exchange>
						<question>What happened?</question>
						<answer triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="showHat">They came into city hall and turned everything bland with that gizmo! Look for yourself!</answer>
					</exchange>
					<exchange>
						<question>Who did this?</question>
						<answer>Dr. Blandston! The Doc's been turning our beloved, goofy island into a boring, overly dramatic, wasteland devoid of color and whimsy!</answer>
					</exchange>
					<exchange>
						<question>Are you doing anything about it?</question>
						<answer>Detective Gram is on the case! She may be awfully drab as well but...she's a detective!</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<conversation event="clue_found">
					<exchange>
						<question>I need to get your thumb print, Mr. Mayor.</question>
						<answer triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="print_mayor,true">Oh? I see... Lucky for you– I'm all thumbs!</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<conversation event="print_mayor"><!-- could and probably should be something entirely different -->
					<exchange>
						<question>What happened?</question>
						<answer triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="showHat">They came into city hall and turned everything bland with that gizmo! Look for yourself!</answer>
					</exchange>
					<exchange>
						<question>Who did this?</question>
						<answer>Dr. Blandston! The Doc's been turning our beloved, goofy island into a boring, overly dramatic, wasteland devoid of color and whimsy!</answer>
					</exchange>
					<exchange>
						<question>Are you doing anything about it?</question>
						<answer>Detective Gram is on the case! She may be awfully drab as well but...she's a detective!</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
			</character>
			<character id="detective">
				<statement lockInput="true" link="accuse">Where were you the night of, well, a half hour ago?</statement>
				<conversation lockInput="true" id="accuse">
					<exchange>
						<question lockInput="true" link="answer" linkEntityId="detective">Uh, not here. Are you accusing me of...do I look bland to you!?</question>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement lockInput="true" id="answer" link="obvious">Do you really want me to answer that?</statement>
				<statement lockInput="true" id="obvious"  link="search">You're obviously not from this island, I could use your help.</statement>
				<statement lockInput="true" id="search" triggerEventArgs="search_for_clues" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Search this building for clues and come back to me once you've found something.</statement>
				<conversation event="search_for_clues">
					<exchange>
						<question>What is going on, exactly?</question>
						<answer link="prefer">A perp going by the name of "Dr. Blandston" has been transforming the Island into a dreary place.</answer>
					</exchange>
					<exchange>
						<question>What should I look for?</question>
						<answer>Clues and information. We are looking for anything that could lead to the doctor's identity.</answer>
					</exchange>
					<exchange>
						<question>How long has this been happening?</question>
						<answer>Seems like I've been on this case forever.</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement id="prefer">I may prefer it, to be honest, but it's got a lot of folks scared.</statement>
				<statement lockInput="true" event="gotItem_broken_device" link="cc">Well, well Kid! Looks like there's a detective in you after all.</statement>
				<statement lockInput="true" id="cc" link="split">The Crazy Club. Ya know if half the people on this island weren't already crazy, that'd be the first place I would look.</statement>
				<statement lockInput="true" id="split" link="buzz" triggerEvent="giveItem" triggerEventArgs="case_files">From here on out we should split up. I need you to collect 4 remaining thumb prints for my case file.</statement>
				<statement lockInput="true" id="buzz" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="clue_found,true">Start with the mayor and the guy upstairs, then visit me at the Dreary Building in Dullsville. Room 7, I'll buzz you in at the door.</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="guard">
				<conversation>
					<exchange>
						<question>Did you see the doctor?</question>
						<answer>Yeah, they zapped the color right outta the building!</answer>
					</exchange>
					<exchange>
						<question>Can you describe them?</question>
						<answer>How can you describe someone so boring? They looked like anybody.</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
			</character>
			<character id="bland1">
				<statement link="bucky">I hope this investigation ends soon.</statement>
				<statement id="bucky">There's a new Bucky Lucas biography streaming.</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="goofy1">
				<statement>He's just so...boring now...</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="goofy2">
				<statement>There there, we'll get you back to your weirdo self soon!</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="clerk">
				<conversation>
					<exchange>
						<question>Did you see anything that could help the investigation?</question>
						<answer link="a">I once saw this movie...what was it called? It started with something...</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement id="a" link="b">I think it started with the word "crime"...</statement>
				<statement id="b" link="c">Yeah, crime. Or was it "investigation"?</statement>
				<statement id="c" link="d">Anyway, it was about a criminal that stole art from a museum. Really famous art too.</statement>
				<statement id="d" link="e">They stole a piece by Lichtenstoon, if I'm not mistaken, and I seldom am these days.</statement>
				<statement id="e" link="f">Really interesting Pop-Artist, that Lichtenstoon. He was born near Pelican Rock, you know.</statement>
				<statement id="f" link="g">Pelican Rock is home to another famous painter too, by the way. Van Nostrand.</statement>
				<statement id="g" link="h">Van Nostrand's locked up there, but not the thief in the movie.</statement>
				<statement id="h" link="i">Anyway, where was I? Oh yes, Lichtenstoon. He painted "The flying girl".</statement>
				<statement id="i" link="j">I saw the painting once in real life when I was in second grade. Or maybe it was third grade.</statement>
				<statement id="j" link="k">We went on a field trip to another island to go to the art museum there.</statement>
				<statement id="k" link="l">Timmy Jenkins put gum in Speedy Runner's hair while we were on the bus.</statement>
				<statement id="l" link="m">Old Patty, the bus driver, who had worked for the school district for about 10 years, she got real upset.</statement>
				<statement id="m" link="n">Pulled the whole bus over and gave Timmy a real talking to.</statement>
				<statement id="n" link="o">I remember because the gum was spearmint flavor and I don't like spearmint.</statement>
				<statement id="o" link="p">That and the bouncing of the bus made me feel like I would throw up, but I didn't.</statement>
				<statement id="p" link="q">We saw "the flying girl" at the museum and, ya know what, I didn't like it.</statement>
				<statement id="q" link="r">I disliked it so much I did throw up.</statement>
				<statement id="r" link="s">But really I did it for the attention, I was a real goofy kid, not like I am now.</statement>
				<statement id="s" link="t">So, like I've been saying, this movie was pretty good.</statement>
				<statement id="t" link="u">You should watch it. I think it will be very helpful for you to learn how to be a real detective.</statement>
				<statement id="u" link="v">I mean, Gram seems to know what she's doing, but I think she's pretty new at it.</statement>
				<statement id="v" link="w">You should probably talk to her about it. She's probably seen the movie.</statement>
				<statement id="w" link="x">I bet she has, detectives really like crime movies.</statement>
				<statement id="x" link="y">At least I think they would, I've never really asked.</statement>
				<statement id="y" link="z" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="z">Maybe you two could watch it together.</statement>
				<statement event="z">I hope that helped.</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="planner">
				<conversation>
					<exchange>
						<question>I'm looking for information on Dr. Blandston.</question>
						<answer>Not much to say. They came in and now everything is in order. Makes my job a lot easier.</answer>
					</exchange>
					<exchange>
						<question>You like being...bland?</question>
						<answer link="yesterday">Oh yes. I'm a city planner and now everything makes sense.</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement id="yesterday">Yesterday we were making room for an underwater taco restaurant. Now it's going to be an above water library.</statement>
				<conversation event="clue_found">
					<exchange>
						<question>Sir, I'll need your thumb print for the investigation.</question>
						<answer link="however">Very sensible. I'd suspect me too. I very much look forward to the whole island being orderly.</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement id="however" link="when">However, before I comply I want to make sure you have this island's best interest in mind.</statement>
				<statement id="when" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="question1,true" link="question1">If you are going to help this island, you should know even the simplest facts about it.</statement>
				<statement event="question1" link="answer1">When was it founded?</statement>
				<conversation id="answer1">
					<exchange>
						<question forceOnScreen="true">1976.</question>
						<answer>That is when we were discovered, not founded.</answer>
					</exchange>
					<exchange>
						<question forceOnScreen="true">Trick question, just this year.</question>
						<answer>Just because you only discovered it this year, doesn't mean we didn't exist before then.</answer>
					</exchange>
					<exchange>
						<question forceOnScreen="true">1600's.</question>
						<answer triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="question2,true" link="question2">Very close, 1647. The island wasn't always goofy, but its inhabitants have largely forgotten that fact.</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement event="question2" link="answer2">Who founded it?</statement>
				<conversation id="answer2">
					<exchange>
						<question forceOnScreen="true">The mayor.</question>
						<answer>We may be weird here, but even we don't live that long.</answer>
					</exchange>
					<exchange>
						<question forceOnScreen="true">Emperor Thirsty Flame.</question>
						<answer triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="question3,true" link="question3">Yes, they united the island, but the native peoples date as far back as 1000 years before them.</answer>
					</exchange>
					<exchange>
						<question forceOnScreen="true">Xavier.</question>
						<answer>Incorrect. The island pre-dates our modern concept of adventurers.</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement event="question3" link="answer3">Final question, who "discovered" the island?</statement>
				<conversation id="answer3">
					<exchange>
						<question forceOnScreen="true">Xavier</question>
						<answer link="final">Yes, i'm glad you have taken the time to learn more about our colorful island's history.</answer>
					</exchange>
					<exchange>
						<question forceOnScreen="true">Amelia</question>
						<answer>I've no idea who that is.</answer>
					</exchange>
					<exchange>
						<question forceOnScreen="true">I did, duh.</question>
						<answer>Are you sure you aren't from around here? That's a very goofy answer.</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement id="final" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="print_planner,true">You've proven enough of an interest in the island to investigate. Here you go.</statement>
				<conversation event="print_planner">
					<exchange>
						<question>I'm looking for information on Dr. Blandston.</question>
						<answer>Not much to say. They came in and now everything is in order. Makes my job a lot easier.</answer>
					</exchange>
					<exchange>
						<question>You like being...bland?</question>
						<answer link="yesterday">Oh yes. I'm a city planner and now everything makes sense.</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
			</character>
			<character id="director">
				<conversation>
					<exchange>
						<question>Please tell me you have something, anything, useful to the investigation.</question>
						<answer link="a">Me? Investigation, you say?</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement id="a" link="b">I don't know anything about that. I'm a modest, ordinary tree. Nothing to see here!</statement>
				<statement id="b" link="c">Tell me something, have you ever felt like somebody else? Have you ever come back from a daze and weren't sure where the time went?</statement>
				<statement id="c" link="d">Where were you then? If you were there wouldn't you recall?</statement>
				<statement id="d" link="e" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="e">If you weren't there in your daze, who was?</statement>
				<statement event="e">Who were you then?</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="worker">
				<conversation>
					<exchange>
						<question>Can you tell me about what happened?</question>

	<file path="/dialog.xml">
		<dialogs>
			<character id="player">
				<statement id="no" link="time" linkEntityId="detective">No, and there's more than one Doctor. I got one, the mayor...</statement>
				<statement id="gram" link="thataway" linkEntityId="mayor_follower">Uh, Detective Gram... I see only one set of prints here...</statement>
				<statement lockInput="true" id="glad">Looks like your craziness wore off! Let's go after her!</statement>
				<statement triggeredByEvent="cant_use_leaf_blower">I don't think this is of any use here.</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="detective">
				<statement link="no" linkEntityId="player">It... it's the Doctor, they made my arm... goofy! Did you see anyone on your way up?</statement>
				<statement id="time" link="perps">There's still time! They couldn't have gotten in or out without a buzz.</statement>
				<statement id="perps" triggerFirst="true" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="setLabel-detective-give_item" link="hiding">Take this, dust it on the door knob there. It should only have my prints and our perp's!</statement>
				<statement lockInput="true" id="hiding">The doctor is hiding behind whichever door matches those prints!</statement>
				<statement event="gotItem_duster">Hurry, dust the knob for prints!</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="mayor_follower">
				<statement id="thataway" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="detective_ran,true">She went that-a-way.</statement>
			</character>
		</dialogs>
	</file>

	<file path="/dialog.xml">
		<dialogs>
			<character id="player">
				<statement id="hint">Hmm... maybe I should collect more finger prints while I wait for the club to open.</statement>
				<statement id="nice">Nice one, Bosko...</statement>
				<statement id="sure">You sure are.</statement>
				<statement id="no" lockInput="true" link="blandified_bosko" linkEntityId="bosko">Bosko nooooooo!</statement>
				<statement lockInput="true" id="one">There's more than one Blandston? I really gotta get to Detective Gram now!</statement>
				<statement id="gram">Really need to get to Detective Gram.</statement>
				<statement triggeredByEvent="cant_use_leaf_blower">I don't think this is of any use here.</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="bosko">
				<conversation>
					<exchange>
						<question lockInput="true">Bosko I presume? I'm going to need your thumb print for Gram's investigation.</question>
						<answer lockInput="true" link="formality">Bosko bad guy? Yes?</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<conversation id="formality">
					<exchange>
						<question lockInput="true">Not necessarily, It's just a formality.</question>
						<answer lockInput="true" link="joke0">Okay. Try new joke first, yes?</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<conversation id="joke0">
					<exchange>
						<question link="thumb" linkEntityId="bosko" lockInput="true">Deal.</question>
					</exchange>
					<exchange>
						<question link="thumb" linkEntityId="bosko" lockInput="true">Please just give me the print.</question>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement id="thumb" link="givePrint">What thumb say... to you?</statement>
				<conversation id="givePrint">
					<exchange>
						<question lockInput="true">What?</question>
						<answer lockInput="true" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="print_bosko,true">...Bosko make up on spot, sorry, here go.</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement event="print_bosko" link="monster">Hallo</statement>
				<conversation id="monster">
					<exchange>
						<question>Hi, are you a monster?</question>
						<answer link="joke1">Bosko is proud monster, yes. You like joke?</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<conversation id="joke1">
					<exchange>
						<question>I guess.</question>
						<answer link="punch1">What did rock say to... other rock?</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement id="punch1" triggerEventArgs="joke2" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" link="nice" linkEntityId="player">Nothing... they is rock, yes! Hah Hah Hah!</statement>
				<statement event="joke2" link="hint">Knock, Knock...</statement>
				<statement id="hint" link="whos_there">You say, who there.</statement>
				<conversation id="whos_there">
					<exchange>
						<question>Who there?</question>
						<answer link="punch2">It Bosko.</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<conversation id="punch2">
					<exchange>
						<question>Bosko who?</question>
						<answer triggerEventArgs="joke3" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" link="sure" linkEntityId="player">... it me... I Bosko, yes?</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement event="joke3" link="sure">You ready... more joke?</statement>
				<conversation id="sure">
					<exchange>
						<question>Sure.</question>
						<answer link="punch3">What six say to, uhhh, seven?</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<conversation id="punch3">
					<exchange>
						<question>What?</question>
						<answer triggerEventArgs="joke4" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">We thirteen! Bosko good math, yes! Hah Hah Hah!</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement event="joke4" link="yes">Joke, yes?</statement>
				<conversation id="yes">
					<exchange>
						<question>Yes.</question>
						<answer link="punch4">Your mom...</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<conversation id="punch4">
					<exchange>
						<question>...yes?</question>
						<answer triggerEventArgs="joke5" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Is nice mom.</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement event="joke5" link="tired">Bosko tired, no joke.</statement>
				<conversation id="tired">
					<exchange>
						<question>There there, bud.</question>
						<answer triggerEventArgs="joke6" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Not! Hah Hah Hah!</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement event="joke6" link="no">Bosko tired.</statement>
				<conversation id="no">
					<exchange>
						<question>... No joke?</question>
						<answer>Bosko mechanic, not machine!</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<conversation event="blandified_bosko">
					<exchange>
						<question lockInput="true">Bosko, I'm so sorry.</question>
						<answer lockInput="true" link="lifetime">Bosko is... doing really rather fine.</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement lockInput="true" id="lifetime" link="chap">I haven't felt this loquacious in, well, a lifetime.</statement>
				<statement lockInput="true" id="chap" link="friend">Worry not, chap, I wrote myself a note should such an occurrence ever come about.</statement>
				<statement lockInput="true" id="friend" triggerEvent="giveItem" triggerEventArgs="leaf_blower" link="one" linkEntityId="player">It reads "Friend, Bosko give bestest thing you". Here you go!</statement>

	<file path="/dialog.xml">
		<dialogs>
			<character id="player">
				<statement triggeredByEvent="cant_use_leaf_blower">I don't think this is of any use here.</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="mayor">
				<statement forceOnScreen="true" id="whoozit" link="description" linkEntityId="detective">It looked like a whoozy-whatsit, I tell you! Absolutely a whoozy-whatsit!</statement>
				<statement forceOnScreen="true" id="boring" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="intro_seen,true">They were the very definition of boring! Dr. Blandston has struck again!</statement>
				<statement event="fate_sealed" link="hat">I am soooo relieved to be back to my abnormal self. And, most importantly–</statement>
				<statement id="hat">My hat is back!</statement>
				<statement event="fate_boring">I will resign my post and look forward to democratic, mayoral elections.</statement>
				<statement id="complete" link="medal">The island is....saved? At least there won't be so many Dr. Blandstons running around.</statement>
				<statement id="medal" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="completeIsland">On behalf of the people of this island, I bequeath you this medallion!</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="detective">
				<statement forceOnScreen="true" link="look">People sure do strange things on Goofball Island.</statement>
				<statement forceOnScreen="true" id="look" link="whoozit" linkEntityId="mayor">What did this device look like?</statement>
				<statement forceOnScreen="true" id="description" link="boring" linkEntityId="mayor">And they fit the description? Gray surgeon outfit, burning eyes, the works?</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="detective2">
				<statement event="fate_sealed">Back to being as hard boiled as ever.</statement>
				<statement event="fate_goofy">I'm quitting being a detective and making my office into an art studio / pizzeria!</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="bosko">
				<statement event="fate_sealed" link="how">Bosko better. Tell more joke.</statement>
				<statement id="how" link="a">How car cross road?</statement>
				<conversation id="a">
					<exchange>
						<question>How?</question>
						<answer triggerEventArgs="b" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">It drive... Hah Hah Ha!</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement event="b" link="what">What square root of 404?</statement>
				<conversation id="what">
					<exchange>
						<question>What?</question>
						<answer link="jk">It 9!</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement id="jk" triggerEventArgs="c" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Just kid! It 20.0997512422!</statement>
				<statement event="c" link="joke">What Bosko say to you?</statement>
				<conversation id="joke">
					<exchange>
						<question>... A joke?</question>
						<answer>Hah hah, that good joke!</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement event="fate_boring">I say, I do so look forward to putting my engineering degree to use.</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="fry">
				<statement link="options">What can I get you?</statement>
				<conversation id="options">
					<exchange>
						<question>I'll try a Fiery Fred.</question>
						<answer triggerEventArgs="setPart-item-goofball_fieryfred" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">You got it.</answer>
					</exchange>
					<exchange>
						<question>Gimme a Zippy Fred.</question>
						<answer triggerEventArgs="setPart-item-goofball_zippyfred" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">You got it.</answer>
					</exchange>
					<exchange>
						<question>Fry me up some Flying Freds.</question>
						<answer triggerEventArgs="setPart-item-goofball_flyingfred" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">You got it.</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement event="fate_boring">I'm outta food. I'm in the process of making it all gray.</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="npcGoofballQuest">
				<statement triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="goofball_quest_declined,true" link="response">Hi, I'm Katie Dare from Hive news. You look like the kind of bold, young hero that has what it takes to save the day.</statement>
				<conversation id="response">
					<exchange>
						<question>Sure am.</question>
						<answer triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="goofball_quest_member_check">Really!</answer>
					</exchange>
					<exchange>
						<question>That's a bit of a bold assumption.</question>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<conversation triggeredByEvent="is_member">
					<exchange>
						<question triggerEventArgs="start_goofball_quest,true,hub" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Who needs saving?</question>
						<answer triggerEventArgs="game.scenes.goofball.sidequest.Sidequest" triggerEvent="loadScene">Well, actually I do. Step inside.</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement triggeredByEvent="non_member" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="goofball_quest_declined">...Sorry, this might be too much to ask of you, come back when you are a member.</statement>
				<statement event="goofball_quest_declined" link="response2">Ready to help me now?</statement>
				<statement event="goofball_quest_started" triggerEventArgs="game.scenes.goofball.sidequest.Sidequest" triggerEvent="loadScene">Thanks for offering to help, come inside.</statement>
				<conversation id="response2">
					<exchange>
						<question>Sure am.</question>
						<answer triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="goofball_quest_member_check">Really!</answer>
					</exchange>
					<exchange>
						<question>Buzz off.</question>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
			</character>
		</dialogs>
	</file>

	<file path="/dialog.xml">
		<dialogs>
			<character id="player">
				<statement>What have I done! This is taking forever!</statement>
				<statement triggeredByEvent="cant_use_leaf_blower">I don't think this is of any use here.</statement>
				<statement linkEntityId="room3" id="rude">Rude!</statement>
					<statement linkEntityId="room5" id="paper">Dang, I really wanted me some clips!</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="tv">
				<statement link="city">Sightings of Dr. Blandston have increased exponentially in recent days.</statement>
				<statement id="city" link="half">City Hall and several people in the area are Blandston's latest victims.</statement>
				<statement id="half" link="gangs">Now, nearly half of Goofball island is bland, up 20 percent from last year.</statement>
				<statement id="gangs" link="more">With so many incedents, some are reporting sightings of gangs of doctors in the streets.</statement>
				<statement id="more" link="plan">Just who is Dr. Blandston?</statement>
				<statement id="plan">And what is their plan for our fair island?</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="room1">
				<conversation>
					<exchange>
						<question>Hello? I'm looking for Detective Gram.</question>
						<answer>Her office is upstairs, room 7.</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
			</character>
			<character id="room2">
				<conversation>
					<exchange>
						<question>Anybody home?</question>
						<answer>Nope. Nobody here...</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
			</character>
			<character id="room3">
			<statement linkEntityId="player" link="rude">Get out of here!</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="room4">
			<conversation>
					<exchange>
						<question>Helloooo?</question>
						<answer link="news">What on earth are you doing? Be quiet!</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement id="news">Don't you know there are Blandstons afoot? It's all over the news!</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="room5">
			<statement linkEntityId="player" link="paper">Pete's is closed. No paper clips for you.</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="room6">
			<conversation>
					<exchange>
						<question>I'm looking for Gram?</question>
						<answer>The uh...dancer? Dentist? Designer?</answer>
					</exchange>
				<exchange>
						<question>The Detective?</question>
						<answer>Whatever she is these days, she's next door.</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
			</character>
		</dialogs>
	</file>

				<statement lockInput="true" id="quick" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="approach">Over here! Quickly now!</statement>
				<statement lockInput="true" link="think">Yes you! See any other adventurers around here?</statement>
				<statement lockInput="true" id="think" link="ok" linkEntityId="player" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="intro_seen,true">You'd think they'd be used to how this works these days. Inside! Come, come!</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="dr">
				<statement triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="hurt" link="hurt">Hold on, one second... Yes? Do you need something? Are you hurt?</statement>
				<conversation id="hurt">
					<exchange>
						<question>Uh, no...</question>
						<answer>Then leave me alone, be gone!</answer>
					</exchange>
					<exchange>
						<question>It's... my heart!</question>
						<answer link="stopped" linkEntityId="player">What is it? Palpitations? Pain? What?</answer>
					</exchange>
					<exchange>
						<question>Watcha doin?</question>
						<answer>I'm on the phone. I'm a busy businessman, be gone!</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement id="wrong">...What is wrong with you? Are you sick? Be gone!</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="girl1">
				<statement lockInput="true" link="step2" linkEntityId="girl2">Haha what a dork!</statement>
				<statement lockInput="true" id="step2" link="what">Haha what a dork!</statement>
				<conversation id="what">
					<exchange>
						<question lockInput="true">What are you talking about?</question>
						<answer lockInput="true" link="response" linkEntityId="girl2">This guy was digging up a tomb and was totally swarmed by snakes!</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement lockInput="true" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="talked_girls" id="response">This guy was digging up a tomb and was totally swarmed by snakes!</statement>
				<statement event="talked_girls">Hehehe!</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="girl2">
				<statement lockInput="true" link="step2" linkEntityId="girl1">He's kinda cute!</statement>
				<statement lockInput="true" id="step2" link="what">He's kinda cute!</statement>
				<conversation id="what">
					<exchange>
						<question lockInput="true">What are you talking about?</question>
						<answer lockInput="true" link="response" linkEntityId="girl1">It's the Curse of the Jade Scarab! Lol!</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement lockInput="true" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="talked_girls" id="response">It's the Curse of the Jade Scarab! Lol!</statement>
				<statement event="talked_girls">Lol!</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="husband">
				<statement>Isn't this all so exciting, sugar-poo!?</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="wife">
				<statement>By golly, it sure is, honey-bum!</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="bes">
				<statement lockInput="true" link="response">Yo, yo, yo! I'm your ride!</statement>
				<conversation id="response">

	<file path="/dialog.xml">
		<dialogs>
			<character id="player">
				<statement>Gotta go after Gram.</statement>
				<statement lockInput="true" triggeredByEvent="fan_invests_in_camels">Well, hopefully he will meet me back at the village...</statement>
				<statement id="wait" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="completeIsland">Wait! What if I get turned into a beetle!</statement>
				<statement id="mummy">Seems a little stiff. Wonder if he knows a good Cairo-practor?</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="claira">
				<statement lockInput="true" link="artifacts">Come! Look at this... this empty space of nothing! All we have is the information plaque!</statement>
				<statement lockInput="true" id="init">Come, Come! Quickly now!</statement>
				<statement lockInput="true" id="artifacts" link="response">None of the artifacts have arrived!</statement>
				<conversation id="response">
					<exchange>
						<question lockInput="true">And you want me to find the artifacts?</question>
						<answer lockInput="true" link="heard">Are you an archaeologist? Of course not! I want you to find what happened to the archaeologist!</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement lockInput="true" id="heard" link="meet">I haven't heard from them in days. My brother, Bes, will drive you.</statement>
				<statement lockInput="true" id="meet" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="meet_bes,true">Meet him outside. Go now, go! Out!</statement>
				<statement event="meet_bes">My brother will take you to the excavation. Go, go!</statement>
				<statement event="finale_complete" link="deserve">Oh thank you, thank you! The exhibit is open and the Scarab is protected!</statement>
				<statement id="deserve" link="wait" linkEntityId="player">I think you deserve this!</statement>
				<statement event="hasItem_medal_jade_scarab">The Scarab remains where it belongs, with its people.</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="fan">
				<statement triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="fact" link="fact">You wouldn't know it just by looking at me, but I really like camels.</statement>
				<statement event="fact" link="response">Would you like to hear a camel fact?</statement>
				<conversation id="response">
					<exchange>
						<question triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="next_fact">Sure!</question>
					</exchange>
					<exchange>
						<question>I think I hear a camel calling my name... over there.</question>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement lockInput="true" id="fact1">When thirsty, camels can drink entire lakes! What I would pay to see such a thing!</statement>
				<statement lockInput="true" id="fact2">The earth is perched on the back of a giant camel. Fun fact, you don't see her in pictures of space because she, like all camels, can go invisible when provoked.</statement>
				<statement lockInput="true" id="fact3">The camel's only natural predator is the great white shark. All other animals fear the ferocity of the camel.</statement>
				<statement lockInput="true" id="fact4">The pupa stage of the camel, the cameel, is highly venomous. They are seldom seen because they live beneath the sand.</statement>
				<statement lockInput="true" id="fact5">Camels once stood on their hind legs and would bound after their prey, primarily lizards, much like today's gorillas.</statement>
				<conversation event="camels_thirsty">
					<exchange>
						<question lockInput="true">For the low price of 9999 credits, you can witness a bunch of camels drink a bunch of water out in the desert!</question>
						<answer lockInput="true" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="fan_invests_in_camels,true">Whaaaaaat?! Where?! Nevermind that! I'll scour the whole desert until I find them!</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
			</character>
			<character id="tourist">
				<statement>So much knowledge can be found in our ancient past.</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="husband">
				<statement>They look just like you, love-mummy!</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="wife">
				<statement>One more vacation with you and you wouldn't be wrong, shmoopy-pumpkin!</statement>
			</character>
		</dialogs>
	</file>

	<file path="/dialog.xml">
		<dialogs>
			<character id="player">
				<statement lockInput="true">Looks like it's caved in... I'll need to find a way through.</statement>
				<statement id="digging">Hmm... someone's been digging here. Must have been before the flood?</statement>
				<statement triggeredByEvent="no_use">No use using that here.</statement>
				<statement id="need_merkhet">Looks like one of these contraptions is missing.</statement>
				<statement id="hieroglyphics">There are a bunch of engravings of pictures here, but what do they mean?</statement>
				<statement lockInput="true" triggeredByEvent="no_use_rubbing">Someone in town must be able to read these.</statement>
				<statement id="scarab" link="shiny" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="setPart-item-jade_scarab">The Jade Scarab!</statement>
				<statement id="shiny" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="take_scarab">Hey check this out! It's sparkly...</statement>
				<statement id="shocking" link="someone" linkEntityId="foreman">Shocking.</statement>
				<statement id="psycho" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="reveal_secret_door,true">Ah! What kinda psycho locks someone in a tomb!?</statement>
				<statement id="step1">In a time of famine, the pharaoh pleaded with the gods.</statement>
				<statement id="step2">The gods gifted the Scarab to the pharaoh and his people.</statement>
				<statement id="step3">Overnight, life and prosperity swept the land.</statement>
				<statement id="step4">Bringing bounties of crops, livestock, and fish.</statement>
				<statement id="wrong" link="step1">I must have messed up the order.</statement>
				<statement id="no_clue">Maybe I should ask around if anyone knows what these images mean.</statement>
				<statement id="right">Aha, it all makes sense now.</statement>
				<statement id="lucky">I have no clue how, but I got it right I guess.</statement>
				<statement id="no_use_rubbing">I need to find someone to help me make sense of this.</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="foreman">
				<statement id="curse" link="me">Ha! Who needs a curse with you around?!</statement>
				<statement id="me" link="shocking" linkEntityId="player">I was the one behind all the curse...iness! Me!</statement>
				<statement id="someone" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="leave">Someone is going to pay a fortune for this. Bye bye!</statement>
			</character>
		</dialogs>
	</file>

	<file path="/dialog.xml">
		<dialogs>
			<character id="player">
				<statement id="camels">I think I saw someone back at the museum that would pay top dollar to see these camels...</statement>
				<statement id="thirsty">They sure look thirsty...</statement>
				<statement lockInput="true" id="no_need_merchant" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="merchant_curse" link="merchant_curse" linkEntityId="merchant">Hmm, doesn't look like any of these will help me yet.</statement>
				<statement lockInput="true" id="oof" link="ohwell">Oof! Maybe the curse is real...</statement>
				<statement lockInput="true" id="ohwell" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="tomb_opened,true">Well, time to go inside the tomb!</statement>
				<statement triggeredByEvent="no_use">No use using that here.</statement>
				<statement id="no_use_hawk">It really loves eating those bugs...</statement>
				<statement id="thought" link="grandson" linkEntityId="merchant">Yes, yes, the merkhet...</statement>
				<statement id="bad">I know you're an old lady, but you should feel bad for that.</statement>
				<statement lockInput="true" id="part1" link="part2">In a time of famine, the pharaoh pleaded with the gods.</statement>
				<statement id="part2" lockInput="true" link="part3">The gods gifted the Scarab to the pharaoh and his people.</statement>
				<statement id="part3" lockInput="true" link="part4">Overnight, life and prosperity swept the land.</statement>
				<statement id="part4" lockInput="true">Bringing bounties of crops, livestock, and fish.</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="bes">
				<statement lockInput="true" id="init" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="bes_gives_tips,true" link="sandvich">Here's the village! Go find the excavation crew down at the dig!</statement>
				<statement lockInput="true" id="sandvich" link="bes_gives_tips">Now, I gotta find me a sandwich or someth'n...</statement>
				<conversation event="bes_gives_tips">
					<exchange>
						<question forceOnScreen="true">Where is the dig site?</question>
						<answer>At the bottom of the village, can't miss it.</answer>
					</exchange>
					<exchange>
						<question forceOnScreen="true">How do I get inside the tomb?</question>
						<answer>I bet the people in town would help. They always return a favor.</answer>
					</exchange>
					<exchange>
						<question forceOnScreen="true">Who can help?</question>
						<answer triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="give_hint">Try looking for...</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement id="step1">Howard Diggory, he's leading the expedition.</statement>
				<statement id="step2">Maybe the camel guy?</statement>
				<statement id="step3">That old falconer dude offered to help if you can get his hawk back.</statement>
				<statement id="step4">The merchant knows her artifacts, she could probably help.</statement>
				<statement id="step5">The merchant was hollering after her grandson. He ran off with something important.</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="farmer">
				<statement>They never should have dug that place up! The curse has brought locusts to my field!</statement>
				<statement id="curse1">It's the curse!</statement>
				<statement id="curse2">Cursed!</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="guide">
				<statement lockInput="true" link="response">Camel tour! Camel tour for the low, low price of 9999 credits!</statement>
				<conversation id="response">
					<exchange>
						<question lockInput="true">Over 9000? That's crazy!</question>
						<answer lockInput="true" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="camels_thirsty,true" link="camels_thirsty">I'm desperate to stay afloat! The curse has chased off all the tourists!</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement lockInput="true" event="camels_thirsty" link="camels" linkEntityId="player">I can barely afford water for my camels!</statement>
				<statement lockInput="true" event="fan_invests_in_camels" link="dig_site">With this kind of money, I can open a whole camel theme park! The curse is broken!</statement>
				<statement lockInput="true" id="dig_site" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="camels_drinkup_flood">Ahem, yes you may take the camels down to the dig site.</statement>
				<statement event="tomb_opened">Now that I can afford water, my camels will no longer go thirsty.</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="fan">
				<statement lockInput="true" link="fan_invests_in_camels" linkEntityId="guide">I hope I don't pass out from excitement!</statement>
				<statement event="tomb_opened">I hope I don't pass out from excitement!</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="falconer">
				<statement lockInput="true" link="help">I'm sorry, I cannot help you, my curse-ed falcon flew the coop!</statement>
				<conversation id="help">
					<exchange>
						<question lockInput="true">I bet I could get it back for you.</question>
						<answer lockInput="true">You could? I would certainly return the favor, friend!</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement lockInput="true" event="returned_falcon" link="eyes">Horus! You've come back to me!</statement>
				<statement lockInput="true" id="eyes" triggerEvent="loadScene" triggerEventArgs="game.scenes.jadeScarab.desertOverworld.DesertOverworld">Horus is my eyes in the sky. I think he can help you find that missing equipment in the desert!</statement>
				<statement event="returned_digger">Who's a good birdy-boy?!</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="diggory">
				<conversation>
					<exchange>
						<question lockInput="true">Are you the Archaeologist in charge of the dig?</question>
						<answer lockInput="true" link="history">Dig? What dig? Everything's gone wrong and we might as well bury the whole thing once again!</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement forceOnScreen="true" lockInput="true" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="met_diggory,true" id="history" link="met_diggory">If only someone on this cursed earth could get the Jade Scarab out of that blasted ruin–the museum and I, Sir Howard Diggory, would make history!</statement>
				<conversation event="met_diggory">
					<exchange>
						<question forceOnScreen="true">Do you have any artifacts for the museum?</question>
						<answer link="no_scarab">Only the Jade Scarab matters! Every museum's got a mummy, jars, all sorts of cat statues!</answer>
					</exchange>
					<exchange>
						<question forceOnScreen="true">What's gone wrong, exactly?</question>
						<answer forceOnScreen="true" link="spooked">Exactly everything has gone wrong! The excavation flooded, the digger's stuck, as is the tow truck, and the backup digger is lost in the blessed desert!</answer>
					</exchange>
					<exchange>
						<question forceOnScreen="true">So you think it's cursed?</question>
						<answer link="wrong">I'm a man of science and history! A curse is poppy-cock!</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement id="no_scarab">No Scarab, no exhibit!</statement>
				<statement id="spooked">The villagers are spooked and everything my foreman attempts to remedy our situation is thwarted!</statement>
				<statement id="wrong">And yet... How else could so much go so wrong?</statement>
				<statement event="tomb_opened">Well, get in there!</statement>
				<statement event="seen_cave_in" link="cave_in">Well! What did you find?!</statement>
				<conversation id="cave_in">
					<exchange>
						<question>I got in there, but a cave-in is blocking the next chamber.</question>
						<answer link="vast">There's another digger! ...but the shipment was lost out in the desert...</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement id="vast" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="if_only">The desert is vast. If only there was a way for you to survey the desert quickly!</statement>
				<statement event="if_only">I say, if only we could scour the desert to find the lost digger!</statement>
				<statement lockInput="true" event="returned_digger" link="scuba">I say! What a stroke of luck finding that equipment!</statement>
				<conversation id="scuba">
					<exchange>
						<question lockInput="true">I found a bunch of weird receipts too, including one for scuba gear?</question>
						<answer lockInput="true" link="bday">Scuba, you say? How very curious.</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement lockInput="true" id="bday" link="curse">Oh! Someone must have gotten it for my birthday! It's tomorrow!</statement>
				<statement id="curse" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="inside,true">The surprise is ruined! Curse you, curse!</statement>
				<statement event="inside">The foreman’s already inside digging away!</statement>
				<conversation event="gotItem_rubbing">
					<exchange>
						<question>I found some hieroglyphics inside the tomb, think you can read them?</question>
						<answer>The hieroglyphics inside the tomb predate my substantial knowledge.</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<conversation event="opened_story_door">
					<exchange>
						<question>I'm looking for something... looks like a thingy with a dangly line thing with a thing on the end!</question>
						<answer link="merchant">I say... that thingy... sounds like a merkhet!</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement id="merchant">I've seen one at the old village woman's merchant stand. I knew she'd been thieving from the dig!</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="mechanic">
				<statement>Truck's stuck, ground's too wet. Could be weeks to get this thing out.</statement>
				<statement event="tomb_opened">If only the other digger wasn't lost out in the desert.</statement>
				<statement event="returned_digger">The foreman's already digging out the cave-in inside the tomb!</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="foreman">
				<conversation>
					<exchange>
						<question>You're the foreman right? I can help get in the tomb.</question>
						<answer triggerEventArgs="jerk" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">I have everything sorted.</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<conversation event="jerk">
					<exchange>
						<question>I bet I could get rid of that water problem.</question>
						<answer>How 'bout you solve my problem and get rid of yourself?</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement event="tomb_opened">What have you done!?</statement>
				<conversation event="seen_cave_in">
					<exchange>
						<question>We need a way through the cave-in inside the tomb.</question>
						<answer triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="curse">Well you made a fine mess of it didn't you? The digger's destroyed and the other is lost out in the desert!</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement event="curse">You're the real curse, kid.</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="merchant">
				<statement link="help">Welcome! Have a look at my ancient wares!</statement>
				<conversation id="help">
					<exchange>
						<question>Do you have anything to help me excavate the dig site?</question>
						<answer link="no_need_merchant" linkEntityId="player">Almost certainly, dear! Take a look!</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<conversation event="merchant_curse">
					<exchange>
						<question>Do you know anything about the Jade Scarab?</question>
						<answer>The Scarab was given to the pharaoh long ago by the gods! It brought great bounties to our ancestors.</answer>
					</exchange>
					<exchange>
						<question>Do you believe in the curse?</question>
						<answer>Talk of a curse is ridiculous! Why would you curse something you've safely buried?</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement id="merkhet" link="replaced">Aw the merkhet. A tool used long ago to track the stars and tell time.</statement>
				<statement id="replaced">It replaced the sundial, which was completely useless in the dark!</statement>
				<statement id="item1">An idol of Bastet, a goddess and fierce protector of children.</statement>
				<statement id="item2" link="item2b">Ta'ameya, my lunch! It's made from dried fava beans.</statement>
				<statement id="item2b" link="bad" linkEntityId="player">You know what they say, the more you eat, the more you Toot-ankhamun!</statement>
				<statement id="item3" link="item3b">Aw the merkhet. A tool used long ago to track the stars and tell time.</statement>
				<statement id="item3b">It replaced the sundial at night, which was completely useless in the dark!</statement>
				<statement id="item4" link="item4b">Ancient potters used water, mud, straw, and cow dung to make vessels like this one.</statement>
				<statement id="item4b">Wanna sip from a 4,000 year-old dung bottle?</statement>
				<conversation event="gotItem_rubbing">
					<exchange>
						<question lockInput="true">Can you read old hieroglyphics?</question>
						<answer lockInput="true" link="old">Why? Because I’m old?!</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<conversation event="opened_story_door">
					<exchange>
						<question lockInput="true" link="thought" linkEntityId="player">I'm looking for an item. Has a string and something to do with stars?</question>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement lockInput="true" id="grandson">My grandson has run off with it to try and catch that cat!</statement>
				<conversation event="gotItem_merkhet">
					<exchange>
						<question lockInput="true">What is this thing with a string?</question>
						<answer lockInput="true">A merkhet. Ancient people used it to measure the path of stars in the sky.</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement lockInput="true" id="old" link="pictograms">Heh, heh. I am old! Let me see them!</statement>
				<statement lockInput="true" id="pictograms" link="story">Hmm these aren't hieroglyphics, they're pictograms!</statement>
				<statement lockInput="true" id="story" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="translated_story,true" link="translated_story">They tell a story, you see, but it's out of order. It's an old story, passed down from generation to generation.</statement>
				<statement event="translated_story" lockInput="true" link="part2">In a time of famine, the pharaoh pleaded with the gods.</statement>
				<statement id="part2" lockInput="true" link="part3">The gods gifted the Scarab to the pharaoh and his people.</statement>
				<statement id="part3" lockInput="true" link="part4">Overnight, life and prosperity swept the land.</statement>
				<statement id="part4" lockInput="true">Bringing bounties of crops, livestock, and fish.</statement>
				<conversation event="opened_story_door">
					<exchange>
						<question>I'm looking for an item. Has a string and something to do with stars?</question>
						<answer link="cat">Yes, yes, the merkhet...</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement id="cat" triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggerEventArgs="look_at_kid">My grandson has run off with it to try and catch that cat!</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="kid">
				<conversation>
					<exchange>
						<question>That stick is kind of important, would you let me return it to the ruins?</question>
						<answer lockInput="true" triggerEvent="giveItem" triggerEventArgs="merkhet">The cat seems to have lost interest in it, so I guess so.</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
			</character>
		</dialogs>
	</file>
