<file path="/dialog.xml">
		<dialogs>
			<character id="player">
				<statement id="gate_locked">It's locked, and that's one hefty padlock!</statement>
				<statement event="unlock_gate" linkEntityId="herc" link="gate_locked">The gate is locked!</statement>
				<statement id="myth_intro_response">Cool. I'll go find it.</statement>
				<statement linkEntityId="athena" id="what" link="look">What do you mean?</statement>
				<statement id="ask_mirror" linkEntityId="aphrodite" link="give_mirror">No but do you have anything for my quest?</statement>
				<statement id="gorgeous" linkEntityId="aphrodite" link="agree"> Okay...Sure.</statement>
				<statement linkEntityId="athena" id="nowWhat" link="getHerc">What do I do?</statement>
				<statement linkEntityId="char1" id="helpQuest">Thanks!</statement>
				<statement id="have_teleporter" triggerEventArgs="use_mirror" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">No problem. I've got a magic mirror to get us there.</statement>
				<statement triggerEvent="triggerEvent" triggeredByEvent="item_puzzle_complete" triggerEventArgs="zeus_appears_steal,true">It says, “Whoever wields the five, sacred objects will rule all of Poptropica.”</statement>
				<statement id="rulePoptropica" linkEntityId="zeus" link="myImmortality">What about my immortality?</statement>
				<statement id="foolish" linkEntityId="zeus" link="giveBack">Give them back!</statement>
				<statement id="stopMyFather" linkEntityId="athena" link="howTo">What do I do?</statement>
				<statement id="askHercules" triggerEventArgs="hercules_mainStreet,true" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">I'll go get Hercules.</statement>
			</character>
			<!-- FRUIT HAT LADY  -->
			<character id="char1">
				<statement>May the gods watch over you, stranger.</statement>
				<statement id="myth_intro">Climb the steps to get the apple of immortality.</statement>
				<statement event="gotItem_goldenApple" linkEntityId="player" link="helpQuest" triggerEventArgs="talked_with_fruitHatLady" triggerEvent="completeEvent">You look as if you have been sent on a special errand. The Temple Grove will help you on your quest.</statement>
				<statement event="zeus_appears_steal">May the gods be with you.</statement>
				<statement event="hasItem_medalMythology">I knew you were destined for greatness.</statement>
			</character>
			<!-- SATYR -->
			<character id="satyr">
				<statement>I wouldn't cross this bridge right now. The Sphinx is in a foul mood!</statement>
				<statement triggeredByEvent="satyr_LockedZone">I wouldn't cross this bridge right now. The Sphinx is in a foul mood!</statement>
			</character>

			<!-- HERCULES -->
			<character id="herc">
				<conversation>
					<exchange>
						<question>I need your help! Your dad wants to rule Poptropica. Come with me and see Hades and Poseidon.</question>
						<answer triggerEventArgs="check_for_mirror" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Sorry, kid. I ate way too much for lunch. I can barely move.</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>
				<statement id="after_you">After you...</statement>
				<statement event="zeus_gate_open">After you...</statement>
				<statement id="gate_locked" link="gate_locked_2">Locked to puny mortals like you, maybe. But not to the mighty Hercules!</statement>
				<statement id="gate_locked_2" triggerEventArgs="zeus_gate_open,true" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Watch and learn, grasshopper.</statement>
				<statement id="need_teleporter">Unless you've got something to transport us there I'm staying here.</statement>
				<statement id="notReady_for_ZEUS">I don't think you're ready to face Zeus yet, kid.</statement>
				<statement id="dontVisitAPHRODITE">I'd rather not visit APHRODITE right now.</statement>
			</character>
			<!-- GOAT HERDER -->
			<character id="char6">
				<statement id="feed_to_goat"> If I had that apple I'd feed it to my goat.</statement>
				<!-- <statement>Wow! I can see Mount Olympus from here!</statement> -->
				<statement event="hasItem_medalMythology">At least I've got my goat.</statement>
				<statement event="gotItem_goldenApple">I'd like to feed him to my goat.</statement>
				<statement event="hercules_chilling">I don't remember why I'm standing in line.</statement>
			</character>
			<!-- WOMAN WITH THE GREEN TOGA -->
			<character id="teen2">
				<statement id="golden_apple">Did you hear about the golden apple at the Tree of Immortality?</statement>
				<statement event="gotItem_goldenApple">I can't believe you talked to Zeus.</statement>
				<statement event="hasItem_medalMythology">Where is he now?</statement>
				<statement event="hercules_chilling">My feet are killing me but the wait was worth it.</statement>
			</character>
			<!-- WOMAN IN PURPLE TOGA -->
			<character id="teen1">
				<statement id="immortality_great">I sure did. I wish I could get one. Immortality sounds so great.</statement>
				<statement event="gotItem_goldenApple">The Thunder God scares me.</statement>
				<statement event="hasItem_medalMythology">I don't know but I heard there is a statue of him now.</statement>
				<statement event="hercules_chilling">Someone should build a statue of him.</statement>
			</character>
			<!-- APHRODITE -->
			<character id="aphrodite">
				<statement linkEntityId="player" link="ask_mirror"  triggerEventArgs="talked_with_aphrodite" triggerEvent="completeEvent">Did you come to gaze upon a lovely goddess?</statement>
				<statement id="give_mirror" triggerEvent="giveItem" triggerEventArgs="aphroditeMirror">Sigh...fine. I'll help you. Take this mirror. I've already memorized every detail of my perfect face anyway.  After you visit all of the areas in the mirror once, you can teleport where you need to go.</statement>
				<statement event="gotItem_aphroditeMirror" linkEntityId="player" link="gorgeous">You have to admit I'm gorgeous.</statement>
				<statement id="agree" linkEntityId="player">The Grove of temples is on your right!</statement>
				<statement event="hasItem_medalMythology">You saved the day! Three cheers for you.</statement>
			</character>
			<!-- ELDERLY WOMAN -->
			<character id="crone">
				<statement triggerEventArgs="talked_with_elderlyWoman" triggerEvent="completeEvent">In search of the golden apple, eh? Good luck to you, child. Things aren't always what they seem.</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="athena">

				<statement id="zeus_escaped" link="noGood">This is not good.</statement>
				<statement linkEntityId="player" id="noGood" link="nowWhat">Only the power of Poseidon and Hades can stop my father.</statement>
				<statement linkEntityId="player" id="getHerc" link="askHercules">Hercules can help you reach them.</statement>
				<statement event="hasItem_medalMythology">You are a true hero.</statement>
				<conversation>
					<exchange>
						<question>Who are you?</question>
						<answer>I am Athena. Be careful dealing with my father. He isn't honest.</answer>
					</exchange>
					<exchange>
						<question>Can you help me?</question>
						<answer triggerEventArgs="athena_olives" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Look to the olive trees if you need my help.</answer>
					</exchange>
					<exchange>
						<question>Thanks. Anything else I should know?</question>
						<answer>My brother Hercules might help you once he gets back from lunch.</answer>
					</exchange>
				</conversation>

				<statement event="athena_all_items" link="danger">I see you have the five objects.</statement>
				<statement linkEntityId="player" id="danger" link="what">I have learned something about them. They are dangerous!</statement>
				<statement id="look" triggerEventArgs="item_puzzle_start" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Take a closer look at those clues...</statement>
				<statement id="notGood" linkEntityId="player" link="stopMyFather">Only the power of Poseidon and Hades can stop my father.</statement>
				<statement id="howTo" linkEntityId="player" link="noHelp">Hercules can help you reach them.</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="customDialog1">
				<statement>I dare you to pick an apple!</statement>
				<statement event="gotItem_zeusScroll">Uh oh, you shouldn't have picked that apple!</statement>
				<statement event="got_all_items">Did you complete your quest yet?</statement>
			</character>

			<character id="customDialog2">
				<statement>I double dare you to pick an apple!</statement>
				<statement event="gotItem_zeusScroll">We're just statues. Why would you listen to us?</statement>
				<statement event="got_all_items">Welcome back.</statement>
			</character>
			<character id="zeus">
				<statement linkEntityId="player" triggeredByEvent="zeus_steal_finished" link="rulePoptropica">Thank you! Now I can control all of Poptropica.</statement>
				<statement id="myImmortality" linkEntityId="player" link="foolish">Foolish mortal. I was just using you.</statement>
				<statement id="giveBack" triggerEventArgs="zeus_escaped, true" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Not a chance! Soon all of Poptropica will be under my control.</statement>
			</character>
		</dialogs>
	</file>

<file path="/dialog.xml">
		<dialogs>
			<character id="player">
				<statement linkEntityId="herc" triggeredByEvent="snake_appear" link="justASnake">Yikes! Is that what I think it is!?</statement>
				<statement id="takeWind" triggerEventArgs="bagOfWind" triggerEvent="giveItem">Thanks! This will give me a boost to the top of Mount Olympus.</statement>
			</character>
			<!-- HERCULES -->
			<character id="herc">
				<statement id="justASnake" triggerEventArgs="herc_walk_to_snake" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">It's just a pesky snake. I'll take care of it.</statement>
				<statement id="uhoh" triggerEventArgs="turn_herc_to_stone" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Medusa!? Uh oh, this is not good.</statement>
				<statement>Don't feel sorry for me. I got what I always wanted... a statue on Mount Olympus!</statement>
			</character>
			<!-- MEDUSA -->
			<character id="medusa">
				<statement linkEntityId="herc" id="medusa_appear" link="uhoh">You picked the wrong snake to mess with, buddy.</statement>
			</character>
			<!-- WIND BAG VENDOR -->
			<character id="aeolus">
				<statement linkEntityId="player"  link="takeWind" triggerEventArgs="talked_with_windBagVendor" triggerEvent="completeEvent">I'm impressed you made it this far.  You deserve a free wind bag from an old wind bag like me.</statement>
				<statement id="get_my_bag" linkEntityId="player"  link="takeWind">I'm impressed you made it this far.  You deserve a free wind bag from an old wind bag like me.</statement>
				<statement event="gotItem_bagOfWind" triggerEventArgs="use_bag_of_wind" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">One refill, coming up!</statement>
			</character>
		</dialogs>
	</file>

<file path="/dialog.xml"><dialogs>
	<character id="player">
		<statement id="money" triggerEventArgs="betrayal" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">That's a lot of money... but where did the thief go?</statement>
		<statement id="there" triggerEventArgs="start_run" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">There's the thief!</statement>
		<statement linkEntityId="tex" id="not_booted" link="always_knew">I'm not the Booted Bandit! </statement>
		<statement linkEntityId="tex" id="framed" link="save_it">What? I've been framed!</statement>
		<statement id="tower">I've got to get up to that tower. There must be something there to help clear my name!</statement>
		<statement id="no_enter">Hope I never have to go back in there... creepy!</statement>
    </character>
	<character id="bandit">
		<statement id="odds" triggerEventArgs="remove_mask" link="double" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">What are the odds? You're the perfect patsy--</statement>
		<statement id="double" triggerEventArgs="double" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">--my exact double!</statement>
		<statement id="enjoy" triggerEventArgs="bandit_out" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Enjoy your trip. I'll just have to come back for the tower treasure!</statement>
    </character>
	<character id="tex">
		<statement id="fan_out" triggerEventArgs="fan_out" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Fan out, guys. This chicken won't fly the coop this time.</statement>
		<statement linkEntityId="player" id="got_you" triggerEventArgs="stand_up" link="not_booted" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">We meet again, Booted Bandit!</statement>
		<statement linkEntityId="player" id="got_you" link="framed">I always knew you'd come back here.</statement>
		<statement id="save_it" triggerEventArgs="capture" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Save it for the warden at Pelican Rock Prison. I'm sure your big friend will be happy to see you there.</statement>
		<statement linkEntityId="p2" id="listen_up" link="gee">Listen up, you mugs! There was a break from Pelican Rock Prison last night. The Booted Bandit is sure to return to the scene of the crime.</statement>
		<statement id="score" triggerEventArgs="manhunt" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Because they hid the score of the lifetime somewhere on this hill! And we're going to nab it first.</statement>
    </character>
	<character id="p1">
		<statement id="stop">Stop right there!</statement>
    </character>
	<character id="p2">
		<statement id="stop">Stop right there!</statement>
		<statement linkEntityId="tex" id="gee" link="score">Gee, Marshal. Why would they go and do a thing like that?</statement>
    </character>
	<character id="p3">
		<statement id="stop">Stop right there!</statement>
    </character>
	<character id="p4">
		<statement id="stop">Stop right there!</statement>
    </character>
	<character id="p5">
		<statement id="stop">Stop right there!</statement>
    </character>
	<character id="p6">
		<statement id="stop">Stop right there!</statement>
    </character>
	<character id="les">
		<statement linkEntityId="sal" id="vamoose" link="now_on">It's been fun, but time for us to vamoose.</statement>
		<statement linkEntityId="sal" id="seed_money" link="knock_over">Just need some seed money to get started.</statement>
    </character>
	<character id="sal">
		<statement linkEntityId="les" id="now_on" link="seed_money">We live on the straight and narrow from now on.</statement>
		<statement id="knock_over" triggerEventArgs="sal_les_out" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Okay, we knock over the Bay City Bank once, and then no more!</statement>
    </character>
</dialogs></file>

<file path="/dialog.xml"><dialogs>
	<character id="player">
		<statement id="stop" triggerEventArgs="run_off" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">I'll stop them!</statement>
		<statement linkEntityId="tex" id="well" link="no_no">Well Marshal, I appreciate all your help.</statement>
    </character>
	<character id="lady">
		<statement id="stop" triggerEventArgs="stop" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Stop, thief!</statement>
		<statement>I'm just waiting for Indigo here to do her business.</statement>
		<statement id="after_theif">Someone needs to stop that thief. Indigo here needs to be calm to do her business.</statement>
		<statement id="after_medal">You look just like that horrible booted bandit!</statement>
    </character>
	<character id="muscles">
		<statement>It's a crime that some pets drink grape soda. I just saw a dog with a purple tongue.</statement>
		<statement id="after_theif">If that bandit comes back here, I'll have a thing or two to say!</statement>
		<statement id="after_medal">I hope the booted bandit stays locked up for good!</statement>
    </character>
	<character id="blades">
		<statement>No time to chat!</statement>
		<statement id="oof" triggerEventArgs="blades_hit" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Oof!</statement>
		<statement id="after_theif">I think I'll just sit here for a while... ugh..</statement>
		<statement id="after_medal">You swam all the way across the bay? Amazing!</statement>
    </character>
	<character id="tex">
		<statement id="no_no" triggerEventArgs="get_medallion" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">No, no, thank you! In fact, here, take this!</statement>
		<statement id="great_job">Great job!</statement>
    </character>
	<character id="patches">
		<statement>I thought I'd never make it out of that cage. You're a lifesaver.</statement>
    </character>
	<character id="nostrand">
		<statement link="final_dialog">Thanks for helping with my parole.</statement>
		<statement id="final_dialog">The city is even more beautiful up close. I'll never run out of things to paint!</statement>
    </character>
	<character id="marion">
		<statement link="final_dialog">Thanks for helping with my parole.</statement>
		<statement id="final_dialog">Time to hit up the help wanted ads!</statement>
    </character>
	<character id="flambe">
		<statement>They say you can't un-collapse a souffle, but now I've got a second chance and I'm going to prove them wrong!</statement>
    </character>
	<character id="dog">
		<statement>Grrr!</statement>
    </character>
</dialogs></file>

<file path="/dialog.xml"><dialogs>
	<character id="player">
		<statement id="job">How can I get a job in the kitchen?</statement>
		<statement id="eggs" triggerEventArgs="need_eggs, true" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Three cage-free eggs it is.</statement>
		<statement id="give_eggs">Three free-range eggs, just like you asked.</statement>
		
		<statement id="yuck">Yuck, this food is gross.</statement>
		
		<statement id="spoon">Can't eat this without a spoon.</statement>
		
		<statement id="gum">Here's three sticks of gum, now how do i get a spoon?</statement>
		
		<statement id="block">These Potatoes are as hard as plaster, maybe i can carve them into something useful.</statement>
		
		<statement id="pasta">This kind of Pasta looks like drill bits.</statement>
		
		<statement id="stealMixer">How can I get Flambe to drop that mixer?</statement>
		
		<statement id="mishap">I probably shouldn't touch the potatoes again, after that last mishap.</statement>
		<statement id="no_taters">Can't stir an empty pot.</statement>
		<statement id="blockPlaster">I don't think Flambe will let me get away with ruining the potatoes a second time!</statement>
		
		<statement id="plate">This looks like it leads to the roof! I wonder if I can drill out these rusty screws.</statement>
       	<statement id="what">What are you doing here?</statement>
        <statement id="mean">What do you mean?</statement>
        <statement id="escape">Then we escape tomorrow night!</statement>
        
        <statement id="okay">Okay!</statement>
        <statement id="stuck">The pipe exploded, I can't go that way!</statement>
        
        <statement id="vents1">The vents are open above table One.</statement>
        <statement id="vents2">The vents are open above table Two.</statement>
        <statement id="vents3">The vents are open above table Three, Florian's favorite spot.</statement>
	</character>
	
	<character id="nightingale">
		<conversation event="mess_day_1_complete">
			<exchange>
				<question>Never mind.</question>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>I'm done eating.</question>
				<answer triggerEventArgs="done_for_day" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Okay, return your spoon.</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
		<conversation event="spoon_distraction">
			<exchange>
				<question>Can I have my spoon now?</question>
				<answer triggerEventArgs="second_spoon" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Sure, here's a spoon. Bring it back when you're done.</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>	
		<statement>Enjoy your meal-time, there will be no seconds.</statement>
    </character>
    
    <character id="ratchet">
        <statement id="take_over">We got a disturbance over there. Nightingale, take over for me.</statement>
        <statement id="what">What's the problem you old coot?</statement>
        <statement id="return">You aren't sick! Another outburst like this and you'll spend the night in solitary.</statement>
        <statement event="spoon_distraction">Not now.</statement>
    	<statement id="spoon">Here's your spoon. Bring it back when you're done eating.</statement>
    	<statement event="hasItem_cafe_spoon">Only one spoon allowed per inmate. Go eat your Gruel.</statement>
    	<statement triggerEventArgs="cafe_spoon" triggerEvent="giveItem">Here's your spoon. Bring it back when you're done eating.</statement>
    	
    	<statement id="sit">Sit down, narcissus!</statement>
    	<statement id="cage">That's it. Lockdown for everyone!</statement>
    </character>
    
    <character id="florian">
    	<statement>This is the best seat in the house. Everyone can see me here!</statement>
    	<statement id="reject">We're not friends Booted Bandit, go sit somewhere else.</statement>
    	<statement id="dead">My beautiful hair! Someone's going to pay for this!</statement>
    	<statement id="make">Make me!</statement>
    	<statement id="hole">I know you set me up, Booted Bandit! When I get out of the hole, you're done for!</statement>
    </character>
    
    <character id="flambe">
    	<statement id="back_off">The food's already at the tables! Go away!</statement>    	
<!--     <statement link="job" linkEntityId="player">I said trained chefs only!</statement> -->
    	<statement id="back_off2">Go away and eat your food!</statement>
    	<statement id="two_ways">One of two ways: you can either get trained at Le Cordon Bleu in Paris...</statement>
    	<statement id="omelette">...or you can find me three eggs to make my signature omelette. This farm-raised stuff isn't cutting it.</statement>
    	    	
    	<conversation event="traded_eggs">
    		<exchange>
	    		<question>How do I mix the mashed Potatoes?</question>
	    		<answer link="mixer">Stir that big pot over there, and don't add anything weird to them.</answer>
	    	</exchange>
	    	<exchange>
	    		<question>Say, could I borrow that mixer?</question>
	    		<answer linkEntityId="player" link="stealMixer">The mixer doesn't leave my side. I'd take this thing into battle!</answer>
    		</exchange>
    	</conversation>

		<statement id="take_eggs">Did you find me three free-range eggs yet?</statement>
    	
    	<statement id="take_eggs2">Finally, I can make a decent omelette! All right, you can be my sous chef.</statement>
    	
    	<statement id="start_work">You're still new at this, so the only thing I'll trust you to do is stir the mashed potatoes.</statement>
    	<statement id="mixer">Remember, good mashed potatoes are smooth and creamy. All potatoes, no filler!</statement>
    	<statement id="rock">This is inedible! It's like a block of marble! I'll never get that Michelin star now.</statement>
    	<statement id="good">Smooth and creamy, fit for human consumption. Good work.</statement>
    	<statement id="waste">It's against prison policy to give out seconds! You trying to set the Warden after us?</statement>
    	   
   		<statement id="sweat">How can they treat my cuisine like that? I put my blood, sweat, and tears into my food!</statement>
  		<statement id="literally">Well, not literally.</statement>
  		<statement id="stop">I've got to stop them!</statement>
  		<statement id="save">Please... save my mixer...</statement>
  		<statement event="started_food_fight">Please... save my mixer...</statement>
  		<statement id="prize">I've never had a sous chef with such dedication. You may keep my prized possession.</statement>
  		<statement id="child">Treat it as you would your own child!</statement>
  		<statement event="gotItem_mixer">Take care of my precious mixer.</statement>
  		
  		<statement event="drilled_plate">My sentence is almost up. Every day I dream of opening a French restaurant up in Napa.</statement>
    </character>    
    
    <character id="patches">
        <statement id="seconds">Hey! a second helping!</statement>
    	<statement id="metal">You just need something metal. I'll help you get "seconds" if you give me Three sticks of gum.</statement>
    	<statement>Meal-time is the best time of the day!</statement>
    	<statement event="mess_day_1_complete">I'll help you get 'seconds' if you give me Three sticks of gum.</statement>
    	<statement id="help2">Got some gum for me yet?</statement>
    	    	
    	<statement id="help">I'll make a distraction, go do what you need to do!</statement>
    	<statement id="fake">Oh noooo, my stomach hurts! guard come help!</statement>
    	<statement id="fake2">The pain!</statement>
    	
    	<statement event="smuggled_spoon">This food all looks the same, been that way for years!</statement>
    </character>
    
    <character id="marion">
      	<statement event="started_food_fight">It's chaos over there!</statement>
    	<statement>Man, I'd love to see Flashy Florian's perfect hair splattered with some of this potato sludge.</statement>
    </character>
    
    <character id="les">
    	<statement id="walls">These walls are crumbling, you know.</statement>
     	<statement>The cook says that the air vent in the kitchen really sucks.</statement>
     	<statement id="seconds">look, table service!</statement>
     	
     	<statement id="foodfight">FOOD FIGHT!!!</statement>
     	
     	<statement id="swing">You're not the only one who can swing a spoon.</statement>
     	<statement id="raft">We've been making a raft and lifejackets.</statement>
     	
     	<statement id="bust">It's time to bust out of this joint!</statement>
    </character>

    <character id="sal">
    	<statement id="crumbling">Crumbling down! Someone could chisel their way out if they weren't careful.</statement>
    	<statement>What am I even eating today?</statement>
    	<statement id="seconds">Is this a one star restuarant now?</statement>
    	
    	<statement id="foodfight">FOOD FIGHT!!!</statement>
    
    	<statement id="outside">But you'll need more than that on the outside. And we can help.</statement>
    	<statement id="night">But we need one more night to finish them.</statement>
    	
    	<statement id="first">We'll go first and set up the rafts.</statement>
    	
    	<statement id="toobad">You'll have to find another way, we'll meet you at the water.</statement>
    </character>
</dialogs></file>

<file path="/dialog.xml"><dialogs>
	<character id="player">
		<statement id="different">This doesn't look like I expected. It's different, but how?</statement>
		<statement id="plaster">There! It's been filled in with plaster! Trusty chisel to the rescue again!</statement>
		
		<statement linkEntityId="bandit" id="you" link="excuse_me">You! Because of you, I had to break out of prison to find this safe!</statement>
		
		<statement linkEntityId="tex" id="last_time" link="prove_it">For the last time, I'm not the Booted Bandit!</statement>
		<statement linkEntityId="bandit" id="contents" link="nice_try">Maybe the contents of the safe will prove my innocence.</statement>
		<statement id="maybe" triggerEventArgs="open_safe" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Maybe I do...</statement>
		
		<statement id="files">Maybe there's something in the prisoner files that can help getting this open...</statement>
		
		<statement id="so_sure" triggerEventArgs="bandit_captured" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Don't be so sure, marshal!</statement>
		
		<statement linkEntityId="tex" id="friends" link="done">I've got some friends with parole hearings coming up. You could put in a good word.</statement>
		<statement id="no_spoon">No use for spoon right now.</statement>
    </character>
	
	<character id="tex">
		<statement linkEntityId="player" id="got_you" link="last_time">I've got you now! Wait – two Booted Bandits?</statement>
		<statement linkEntityId="player" id="prove_it" link="contents">Prove it!</statement>
		
		<statement id="confession" link="take_away">That sounds like a confession to me!</statement>
		
		<statement linkEntityId="player" id="long_time" link="so_sure">The Booted Bandit won't be seeing the outside of a prison cell for a long, long time.</statement>
		
		<statement linkEntityId="player" id="sorry" link="friends">Sorry about the mix-up. Anything I can do to make it up to you?</statement>
		
		<statement id="done" triggerEventArgs="release_prisoners" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Consider it done!</statement>
    </character>
	
	<character id="bandit">
		<statement linkEntityId="player" id="grunt_work" link="you">Thanks for doing the grunt work. I'll take it from here...</statement>
		<statement id="excuse_me" triggerEventArgs="tex_enter" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">That's how the cookie crumbles. Now if you'll excuse me, that treasure is mine.</statement>
		
		<statement linkEntityId="player" id="nice_try" link="maybe">Nice try, but nobody knows the combination except Flashy Fosbury!</statement>
		
		<statement id="at_last" triggerEventArgs="at_last" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">At last, Florian's priceless treasure!</statement>
		<statement id="what" triggerEventArgs="what" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">What, these are just pictures of Florian, the priceless treasure are just head shots!</statement>
		<statement id="years" triggerEventArgs="years" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Years of search and for this! Arrrgghhh!!!!</statement>
    </character>
</dialogs></file>

<file path="/dialog.xml"><dialogs>
	<character id="player">
		<statement id="wait">Listen, I--</statement>
		<statement linkEntityId="bigTuna" id="not_bb" link="watch_your_back">But I'm not--</statement>		
		<statement linkEntityId="florian" id="you_do" link="size">You do?</statement>
		
		<statement id="last_time">This might be the last time we talk.</statement>
		<statement id="bird_too">I'll miss you. The bird, too.</statement>
		<statement id="help_seeds">Say, Patches, got a handful of birdseed?</statement>
				
		<statement id="not_planted">This patch of dirt may actually be able to grow something.</statement>
		<statement id="need_water">Should get plenty of sunlight, but that's not enough...</statement>
		<statement id="already_watered">I don't want to over water the plant.</statement>
		<statement id="sunflower_not_ready">The plant isn't fully bloomed yet. I should water it more.</statement>    	
    	
    	<statement linkEntityId="marion" id="correct_gum_marion" link="gave_gum">Here you go.</statement>
    	<statement linkEntityId="marion" id="wrong_gum_marion" link="more_gum">I don't have enough gum.</statement>    	
    	<statement id="wrong_gum_head">I better get some more gum.</statement>    	
    	<statement id="wrong_gum_noodle">I need more gum.</statement>
    	<statement linkEntityId="nostrand" id="gum_for_noodle" link="get_painted_pasta_back">Seems steep, but here you go.</statement>
    	<statement id="bust_description">'Always watching?' That's not creepy at all.</statement>
    </character>    
    
    <character id="nostrand">
  		<statement event="hasItem_painting">I can help you out with any painting needs.</statement>
    	<conversation event="no_intro_yard">
    		<exchange>
    			<question forceOnScreen="true">Who are you?</question>
    			<answer>Name's Van Nostrand.</answer>
    		</exchange>
    		<exchange>
    			<question>How long have you been here?</question>
    			<answer>Oh, years and years. I've lost count.</answer>
    		</exchange>
    		<exchange>
    			<question>I guess there are worse locations.</question>
    			<answer triggerEventArgs="spoke_to_nostrand" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Are you kidding? Thanks to the sea air, this whole place is crumbling.</answer>
    		</exchange>
    	</conversation>
    	    	
    	<conversation event="yard_intro_shown">
			<exchange>
				<question forceOnScreen="true">What are you painting?</question>
				<answer>The city skyline, just like always.</answer>
			</exchange>    		
			<exchange>
				<question>It looks nice.</question>
				<answer>Thanks, but I'd love to paint something else.</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>Like what?</question>
				<answer>Something that lives and breathes, like a still life of a flower.</answer>
			</exchange>
    	</conversation>
    	
    	<conversation id="give_sunflower">
    		<exchange>
    			<question triggerEventArgs="sunflower,nostrand" triggerEvent="takeItem">It's not a bouquet, but you could paint this flower!</question>
				<answer triggerEventArgs="painting" triggerEvent="giveItem" link="hasItem_painting">Wow, thanks! I've been painting that horizon for twenty years! Here's one of my earlier efforts.</answer>
    		</exchange>
    	</conversation>
    	    	
    	<statement event="give_tonight">Give me tonight to paint it.</statement>
    	
    	<conversation id="try_dummy_head">
    		<exchange>
    			<question triggerEventArgs="dummy_head,nostrand" triggerEvent="takeItem">Can you paint this to look like me?</question>
    			<answer triggerEventArgs="gum_paint_head" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">For five sticks of gum, sure.</answer>
    		</exchange>
   		</conversation>    	
		<!-- gum_for_head is not used because painted_dummy_head is given on same day  -->   
   		<statement id="gum_for_head" triggerEventArgs="give_tonight, true" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Just need one night to paint it. I'll give it to you tomorrow.</statement>
    	<statement id="get_painted_head_back" triggerEventArgs="painted_dummy_head" triggerEvent="giveItem">Got your skin tone exactly right.</statement>
    	
    	<conversation id="try_pasta">
    		<exchange>
    			<question triggerEventArgs="uncooked_pasta,nostrand" triggerEvent="takeItem">Can you paint this silver?</question>
    			<answer triggerEventArgs="gum_paint_noodle" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Easy. That'll run you seven sticks of gum.</answer>
    		</exchange>
    	</conversation> 
		<!-- gum_for_noodle is not used because painted_pasta is given back on same day -->
    	<statement id="gum_for_noodle" triggerEventArgs="give_tonight, true" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Give me one night to paint it.</statement>    	
    	
    	<statement id="get_painted_pasta_back" triggerEventArgs="painted_pasta" triggerEvent="giveItem" link="lead_based">Here you go: one silver piece of corkscrew pasta.</statement>
    	<statement id="lead_based" triggerEventArgs="busted" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">That's a lead-based paint, by the way, so don't eat it.</statement>
    	
    	<statement linkEntityId="warden" id="short_shirt" link="rules">My prison issue shirt is too short. It won't stay tucked!</statement>
    	<statement id="you_cant" triggerEventArgs="steal_paint" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">You can't! Painting is all I have!</statement>
    	
    	<statement event="take_away_paint">Well this can't be good for my upcoming parole hearing.</statement>
    	<statement event="parole_next_day_nostrand">Wish me luck! I'm going before the parole board tomorrow.</statement>
    	<statement event="parole_passed_nostrand">Maybe I can take up sculpting...</statement>
    	
    	<randomSet id="already_painting">
    		<statement>Patience is a virtue.</statement>
    		<statement>I can only complete one project a night.</statement>
    		<statement>Hang on to your sticks, I can only finish one painting a night.</statement>
    	</randomSet>
    </character>    
    
    <character id="patches">
    	<conversation event="no_intro_yard">
    		<exchange>
    			<question>Hi there.</question>
    			<answer>Howdy. I'm Patches.</answer>
    		</exchange>
    		<exchange>
    			<question>Is that your bird?</question>
    			<answer triggerEventArgs="spoke_to_patches" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Yup. Found her with a broken wing. She's healthy now, but forgot how to fly.</answer>
    		</exchange>
    	</conversation>
    	
    	<statement id="meet_warden">Oh boy, here comes the warden. Don't say anything if you don't have to.</statement>
    	<statement event="eggs_collected_3">My parole hearing is coming up soon. Hopefully I can get out of here this time.</statement>
    	<statement event="all_eggs_parole_next">Got my parole hearing again tomorrow. Been going to those so long I forgot how to lie at them.</statement>
    	<statement event="all_eggs_parole_passed">Another ten years in this place. If I'm lucky.</statement>
    	
    	<conversation event="yard_intro_shown">
    		<exchange>
    			<question>What are you doing?</question>
    			<answer triggerEventArgs="already_fed" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Just feeding the birds.</answer>
    		</exchange>
    	</conversation>
    	
    	<conversation event="already_fed">
    		<exchange>
    			<question>Will you feed them again?</question>
    			<answer>Not today, they've had enough.</answer>
    		</exchange>
    	</conversation>
    	
    	<statement id="help">Why, sure.</statement>
    	<statement id="hope">It's been good to know you. You give me hope that there's still life outside these walls.</statement>
    	<statement id="mutual">Aye, she'll miss you too. Maybe I can convince her to fly away with you.</statement> 
    </character>    
    
    <character id="florian">
    	<conversation event="no_intro_yard">
    		<exchange>
    			<question forceOnScreen="true">Who are you?</question>
    			<answer>Don't act like you don't know me, Booted Bandit!</answer>
    		</exchange>
    		<exchange>
    			<question>I'm not the Booted Bandit!</question>
    			<answer>Sure, and I ain't Flashy Florian Fosbury, either.</answer>
    		</exchange>
    		<exchange>
    			<question>So... you are Flashy Fosbury?</question>
    			<answer triggerEventArgs="spoke_to_florian" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Of course I am! And I haven't forgotten that you nicked my safe, so watch your back.</answer>
    		</exchange>
    	</conversation>
    	
    	<conversation event="yard_intro_shown">
    		<exchange>
    			<question>You sure do a lot of exercise.</question>
    			<answer linkEntityId="player" link="you_do">You think it's easy to keep a physique like this? I have the same measurements I had twenty years ago!</answer>
    		</exchange>
   		</conversation>
   		
   		<statement id="size" link="florian_size">26-34-30!</statement>
   		<statement event="florian_size" triggerEventArgs="florian_size, true" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Not that this prison jumpsuit is doing me any favors...</statement>
    </character>
    
    <character id="marion">
    	<conversation event="no_intro_yard">
    		<exchange>
    			<question forceOnScreen="true">Hello there.</question>
    			<answer>Hello, they call me Marion. You made the headlines today, did you know?</answer>
    		</exchange>
    		<exchange>
    			<question>Wait, what do you mean "headline"?</question>
    			<answer>Oh, just today's newspaper.</answer>
    		</exchange>
    		<exchange>
    			<question>I didn't know we had access to current news here.</question>
    			<answer triggerEventArgs="spoke_to_marion" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">You can get anything here, if you know who to ask.</answer>
    		</exchange>
   		</conversation>
   		
   		<conversation event="ask_for_prison_files">
   			<exchange>
   				<question>How much for those prisoner files?</question>
   				<answer triggerEventArgs="gum_marion" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Three sticks of gum.</answer>
   			</exchange>
   		</conversation>
   		
   		<statement id="gave_gum" triggerEventArgs="prison_files" triggerEvent="giveItem">I hope something in these files can help you.</statement>
   		<statement id="more_gum">Then you'd better make some license plates!</statement>
   		<statement event="hasItem_prison_files">Don't let the guards see those files.</statement>
    </character>
    
    <character id="warden">
    	<statement id="statue">This warms a warden's heart; all the criminals paying their debt to society around our fine institution's symbol of order.</statement>
    	
		<statement linkEntityId="player" id="new_guest" link="wait">This must be our new guest, eh?</statement>
		<statement id="keep_it_up" triggerEventArgs="look_to_wall" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Keep up that kind of insolence, and you'll go straight to the hole.</statement>
		<statement id="dat_wall">I see you looking over that wall. You still have the light of hope in your eyes.</statement>
		<statement id="assure" triggerEventArgs="triggerBigTuna" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">But I assure you, escape is impossible. Even for you, Booted Bandit.</statement>
		<statement id="wrap_up">Well, now you know what happens when you misbehave. Carry on.</statement>
		
		<statement id="busted">Ah ha! Caught you in the act.</statement>
		<statement linkEntityId="nostrand" id="shirt" link="short_shirt">I told you that if I caught you with your shirt untucked one more time that you'd lose your painting privileges.</statement>
		<statement linkEntityId="nostrand" id="rules" link="you_cant">Rules are rules. No more painting for you.</statement>
		<statement id="lesson">Let that be a lesson to the rest of you. I will not tolerate rulebreaking.</statement>
    </character>    
    
    <character id="ratchet">
    	<statement event="no_intro_yard">Go mingle with the others.</statement>
   		<statement id="try_day1">Don't even try. Go talk to others while you still have free time.</statement>
    	
    	<statement event="yard_intro_shown" link="leave">Are you ready to go to work?</statement>
    	<conversation id="leave">
    		<exchange>
    			<question triggerEventArgs="leave_for_work, false" triggerEvent="triggerEvent">Yes.</question>
    		</exchange>
    		<exchange>
    			<question>No.</question>
    		</exchange>
    	</conversation>
    	
    	<statement id="line_up">Alright, you know the drill. Fall in line.</statement>
    	<statement id="nice_try">Nice try.</statement>
    	<statement linkEntityId="warden" id="silence" link="keep_it_up">Silence! You do not speak to Warden Sharp.</statement>
    </character>
    
    <character id="bigTuna">
    	<statement linkEntityId="player" id="grunt" link="stay_away">Grrrrr.</statement>
    	
    	<!-- intro -->
    	<statement id="set_me_up">The Booted Bandit?! You set me up!</statement>
    	<statement id="watch_your_back">Watch your back, Booted Bandit! Watch your back!</statement>
    	
    	<statement id="got_you_now">You can't escape me now, Booted Bandit!</statement>
    	<statement id="cant_stop">Bird seeds can't stop us!</statement>
    </character>
</dialogs></file>

<file path="/dialog.xml"><dialogs>
    <character id="char1">
    	<statement>Ssssssh! I'm spying!</statement>
    </character>
    <character id="char2">
		<conversation>
			<exchange>
				<question>Who are you?</question>
				<answer>I am king of the Aztec Empire.</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>Is something wrong?</question>
				<answer>A piece from the sun stone has disappeared!</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>How can I help?</question>
				<answer>Find and return the missing piece!</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
		<conversation event="hasItem_sunstone">
			<exchange>
				<question>Who are you?</question>
				<answer>I am king of the Aztec Empire.</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>Is something wrong?</question>
				<answer>A piece from the sun stone has disappeared!</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question style="haveitem">I have the sun stone piece!</question>
				<answer triggerEventArgs="sunstone, char2" triggerEvent="takeItem">Thank you! We will remember you forever!</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
		<conversation event="returned_sunstone">
			<exchange>
				<question>Who are you?</question>
				<answer>I am king of the Aztec Empire.</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>Tell me about the sun stone.</question>
				<answer>It is dedicated to the sun god Tonatiuh, who keeps us from catastrophe.</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>Is there anything else you need?</question>
				<answer>You've restored the sun stone! What else could I need?</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
    </character>
    <character id="char3">
    	<conversation>
    		<exchange>
    			<question>Who are you?</question>
    			<answer>I am queen of the Aztec Empire.</answer>
    		</exchange>
    		<exchange>
    			<question>Is something wrong?</question>
    			<answer>The king is upset, because a piece from the sun stone has disappeared.</answer>
    		</exchange>
    		<exchange>
    			<question>How can I help?</question>
    			<answer>Find out what happened to the sun stone!</answer>
    		</exchange>
    	</conversation>
    	<statement event="returned_sunstone">Thank you for restoring the sun stone!</statement>
    </character> 
    <character id="char5">
    	<statement>Did you see what happened to the sun stone? The gods must be very angry!</statement>
    	<statement event="returned_sunstone">Thank you! The gods are pleased!</statement>
    </character>
    <character id="char6">
    	<statement>I can see you're not from around here. Watch out for the guards!</statement>
    </character>
    <character id="char7">
    	<statement>The queen seems worried about something.</statement>
    	<statement event="returned_sunstone">Thank you for bringing peace to our queen.</statement>
    </character>
    <character id="char8">
    	<statement>Welcome to our great city, traveler.</statement>
    </character>
    <character id="char9">
    	<statement triggerEventArgs="warriorMask" triggerEvent="giveItem">I'm too old for this! You're young. Here, take my warrior mask.</statement>
    	<statement event="gotItem_warriorMask">You'll make a good warrior with that mask.</statement>
    </character>
    
    <character id="attacker1">
   		<statement event="gotItem_goggles">You can keep that weird mask I gave you.</statement>
    	<statement event="warrior_mask_no_goggles" triggerEventArgs="goggles" triggerEvent="giveItem">Hello, fellow warrior! Check out this cool mask I found!</statement>
    </character>
    <character id="attacker2">
    	<statement event="warriorMaskOn">I like your mask.</statement>
    </character>
</dialogs></file>

<file path="/npcs.xml"><npcs>

<file path="/dialog.xml"><dialogs>
	<character id="char1">
		<statement>Stay back! We can't trust anyone near the treasury any more!</statement>
		<statement event="returned_goldenVase">Thank you! As a reward, you may speak to the oracle on the hill.</statement>
    </character>
	<character id="char2">
		<conversation>
			<exchange>
				<question>What are you doing?</question>
				<answer>We're guarding the treasury. We don't want anything else stolen.</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>Something was stolen?</question>
				<answer>The prized golden vase is gone!</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>Can I help?</question>
				<answer>If you return the golden vase, you may talk to the oracle.</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
		<conversation event="hasItem_goldenVase">
			<exchange>
				<question>What are you doing?</question>
				<answer>We're guarding the treasury. We don't want anything else stolen.</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question>Something was stolen?</question>
				<answer>The prized golden vase is gone!</answer>
			</exchange>
			<exchange>
				<question style="haveitem">I have the golden vase!</question>
				<answer triggerEventArgs="goldenVase, char2" triggerEvent="takeItem">Thank you! As a reward, you may speak to the oracle on the hill.</answer>
			</exchange>
		</conversation>
		<statement event="returned_goldenVase">Thank you! As a reward, you may speak to the oracle on the hill.</statement>
    </character>
    <character id="char3">
		<statement>Courage is the first of human qualities because it is the quality which guarantees the others.</statement>
    </character>
    <character id="char4">
		<statement>The oracle will only talk to those who donate to the treasury.</statement>
    </character>
    <character id="char5">
		<statement>Greetings, stranger. Welcome to Delphi.</statement>
    </character>
</dialogs></file>
